name: JosPlays' Escape: GameJam April 2024
description: ESCAPE! Collect the 5 tools and escape from this creepy attic. Keep the score high by avoiding ghosts and collecting the ghost diamonds, but keep in mind with every diamond you collect, more ghosts will appear and they will become harder to avoid.

name: journey of Reincarnation
description: 【Reincarnation Roguelike Retro RPG】Battle is fully automatic with no commands! Support the characters who think for themselves and do their best by collecting “Jewel”. Repeatedly reincarnate and aim to conquer dungeons that change their appearance each time you enter them!

name: Journey of Harvest
description: Welcome to Hope Town! You will be given an abandoned land where you can collect resources, assemble production lines, upgrade equipment, start adventures, harvest rewards, etc. I believe that in the near future, you will be able to unlock the secrets of the mine and enjoy this harvest journey.

name: Kado Hunter
description: As you are stranded in Vanada, you're meeting the sisters Aya and Chiyo. After you get to know what is happening, you decide to help them. In your journey as KADO HUNTER you will collect KADOS, fight against monsters, solve quests and get ready to explore Vanada.

name: Kadin the Soul Eater
description: A Story driven game, where choices can branch. Pretend to be a mortal with so called friends.

name: Just You
description: "Only One Must Remain Alive" thrusts you into a relentless battleground where survival hinges solely on your individual prowess.

name: Just Walk
description: One Character, One way and One Button you must never let go of.Just Walk.

name: Karting with Animals
description: "Karting with Animals: The Wild Race" flips the script on traditional racing games, infusing the thrill of speed with the unpredictability of the animal kingdom.

name: Karm: Early Access Archives
description: KARM brings back '90s FPS look and feel in a lovecraftian world.

name: Karjala
description: VHS bodycam horror in the atmosphere of Soviet Backrooms. Karelia is a country of rivers, forests and lakes, where the modern world comes in contact with superstitions and ancient rituals. Soldier Solnyshkov agrees to take part in a strange experiment of his command.

name: Kana
description: Start your Japanese learning journey by learning the fundamentals! In Kana, you get to practice Hiragana and Katakana, which are two of the writing systems in Japanese.

name: Kalasta
description: Kalasta is a roguelite deckbuilder fish game with real time strategy mechanics. Play cards to spawn fish, feed them and defend your fish from waves of monsters!

name: Kaiju Fury Turbo
description: Kaiju Fury Turbo is a top-down, couch co-op, non-stop, action adventure. As a kaiju, battle your way from under military control, destroy defense hardened cities, defeat captured kaiju, and become the cataclysm they always feared.

name: K-Bot
description: K-Bot is an innovative puzzle casual game that cleverly combines classic block stacking and path planning game elements. Players need to strategically move within a dynamically changing play area to achieve the goal of clearing lines.

name: Keaton's Adventure
description: Traverse the newly formed Milkdromeda Galaxy to restore balance and stomp out the Ultralite invasion!

name: Rock Band 3: Deluxe
description:
Rock Band 3 Deluxe is a mod for Rock Band 3 with the intention to improve and expands upon Rock Band 3 in every way possible.

With custom track themes, a higher song limit, an FC indicator, break countdowns, an expanded HUD, up to 60FPS venues, "padtar", fully customizable gameplay, many pro chart upgrades, and so much more.

name: Kittentegy
description: Are you ready to accept the challenge and stand up for the delicious cheese? In the Kittentegy game, you have to stop the mice from stealing the cheese from the houses. Your strategic skills and decisive actions will be the key to victory!

name: Kitty Collapse
description: Kitty Collapse offers an explosive first-person experience. Armed with diverse weapons, players demolish towering structures filled with mischievous cats. Each level brings unique challenges, with maps ranging from bustling cityscapes to tranquil countryside settings

name: Knight Lolita
description: An extremely lethal combat system with manual sword control emphasizes the decision to avoid enemies or slaughter even bosses in an instant in wide levels full of roaming monsters. The finished game will feature flight and more vertical exploration.

name: Koitsugi: Legend of the Water Guardian
description: Play as Kaida, a koi who is reluctantly thrown in to save, not just her pond, but the entire river from a poison that turns the habitants into raged filled monsters. In this story driven action-adventure you will slug it out with some of these river dwellers, friend and foe, to save your home!

name: Korean Rail Driving Tour: LRT Busan-Gimhae
description: This game is a railroad simulation game that allows you to experience actual railroad operation based on 1080p, 60 frame video footage of the driving direction of an actual train. Get feeling of being a train driver just by operating the accelerator and brakes. Enjoy S.Korea’s beautiful scenery!

name: Kost
description: KOST is an action adventure RPG game. In the near future, the intelligent system "KOST" will gradually dominate the world. Human consciousness can be transferred to machine generated human chips, and robots can be operated to achieve rebirth. In cruel world, the dark struggle will eventually erupt.

name: Kunkun League
description: Damn! Kunkun, unable to bear the humiliation from Xiao Hei, turned to Lao Da to learn basketball skills. Lao Da's challenge is to find exploding basketballs.

name: Kun’tewiktuk: A Mi’kmaw Adventure
description: Kun’tewiktuk: A Mi’kmaw Adventure is a fantasy adventure game inspired by Mi’kmaw legend and folklore. It chronicles the adventures of siblings Wasuek ("Flower") and her brother U'n ("Fog"). They get separated one summer morning and they go on an adventure through the spirit world to reunite.

name: Lade's Sandbox
description: A voxel-based sandbox game

name: LaughterLost
description: LaughterLost takes you through a surreal journey of work and family life. Face psychological twists, narrative choices, puzzles, and unexpected unique confrontations! Will you break this dystopian cycle of everyday life?

name: Leap 'n Bump!
description: A sexy platformer, now with an extra game expansion. Solve the underground tunnels mystery and help the Endless Forest in the extra content!

name: Le Dernier Don
description: Following a tragic event in an orphanage caused by horrific human experiments, an orphan tries to find other survivors while danger still lurks.

name: Legend of the Master Baiter
description: A fun and unique fishing RPG anybody can enjoy! Beings known as fishgirls show themselves before only a select few worthy fishermen. Fish inhabiting lakes, rivers, and the sea take on bold new forms! Try to collect them all!

name: Leo: The Square
description: Leo: The Square is a minimalist 2D platformer where players guide Leo, a square character, through various levels filled with puzzles and challenges. Explore unique environments, solve puzzles, and uncover the secrets of Leo's journey in this atmospheric adventure.

name: Let's Learn Xaad Kil
description: Let's Learn X̱aad Kíl (Alaskan dialect) is an interactive self-study program designed to help those curious about Haida and to help them be as familiarized as possible. It includes games, activities, and a picture glossary.

name: Life of Kanji Island
description: Life of Kanji Island is a game that helps you understand the ‘meaning’ of Japanese Kanji characters. Survive the island where all elements are composed of Kanji and master the Kanji!

name: Light Bearers 2
description: Light Bearers 2 is a fast paced hide and seek, asymmetrical multiplayer horror game. A Shadow is trying to corrupt all Light Bears. The Light Bears must use their movement and cunning. To keep each other from becoming corrupted by darkness.

name: Light Unseen
description: An underground adventure with magic and fantasy-like monsters with a story where actions affect the outcome

name: Lilly And The Murder In A Dream
description: Sin descripción

name: Lily’s Labyrinth of Lust
description: You’re desperate to see what she looks like under you – but she has other plans. Immerse yourself in Lily’s Labyrinth of Lust and indulge in hypersexual, adrenaline-pumping chases while battling for your place on top. Will victory taste as sweet as her?

name: Limelight
description: Cast various lights on your enemies to destroy them, conquer a hundred randomly generated dungeons and defeat bosses. Always in the Limelight!

name: Lost In Memories
description: Step into the eerie shadows of an old haunted house in 'Lost in memories,' a gripping narrative-driven game that will unravel the mysteries of the past. As you wander through the decaying corridors and dimly lit rooms, you will gradually piece together fragments of memories.

name: Love Hell
description: Love Hell is a cross between a Visual Novel and a Bullet Hell where you have to battle your emotions in order to get with the boy of your dreams! Participate in school activities, defeat your rival, and even play...rock, paper, scissors? Embark on an action-packed journey for romance!

name: Love Island
description: Tired of the hustle and bustle? Take a tour to Love Island - catch 'em all, bang 'em all! Play this match-three game with RPG elements to seduce all those charming anime girls!

name: Love Quest: Los Angeles
description: Connect with intriguing characters through thoughtfully chosen questions in Love Quest: LA. To win a girl's heart, you'll need to ask all questions correctly and eventually invite her on a second date. Can you unravel her desires and emotions to make her your girlfriend by the end of the game?

name: Lover Survivors
description: Two lovers join forces to save the universe through their bond and unique powers, revitalizing the cosmos.

name: Love Sucks: Night Three
description: This is Love Sucks:Night Three, the third and final part in your mission to get laid and not die doing it. When sexy monsters are out to kill you for their own mysterious goals, it's date or die! So far you've manged to both live and die through two nights, but will you get out alive?

name: Lower? Higher!
description: your pawnshop will usher in guests with different needs every day, bargain with them, let the income soar! With the expansion of pawnshops, activities such as sending shop assistants and responding to emergencies are also essential. you seem ordinary transaction may cause the butterfly effect.

name: Lukewarm Massacre: The Spirit of Light
description: Lukewarm Massacre: The Spirit of Light tells a comedy-horror adventure of three forest spirits. Join them in finding their kidnapped friend!

name: Magic Trap
description: Protect the obelisk!

name: Manludo 2
description: EN: Awake on an alien space-station, shape your journey through decisions, crafting your own interstellar adventure. EO: Vekiĝu en ekstertera kosmostacio, formu vian vojaĝon per decidoj, kaj vivu vian propran interstelan aventuron.

name: Man I Just Wanna Go Home
description: Man I Just Wanna Go Home is an "MSPaint-noir" visual novel with 13 endings, a unique visual style and a killer 80s inspired soundtrack. The story revolves around a delivery person stranded in an unfamiliar part of the city under the devastating rain. All he wants is to get home. Help him!

name: Malvinas: La Ultima Carta
description: The last survivor of a battalion (a teenage soldier) must protect the last letter of his fallen comrades. Undergo the hunger, cold and violence the Argentinean soldiers had to endure during the war on the islands.

name: Making Friends
description: Guide the misanthropic witch Morrigan as she creates a homemade friend of her very own in this short and sweet sapphic visual novel!

name: Magic Venue
description: Defeat waves of enemies drawn to your powers! Grow stronger and travel between worlds and dimensions! Magic Venue is an action roguelike game where you battle enemies, build your skill deck, devise strategies, get defeated, but always come back stronger!

name: Mama's Quesadillaria
description: Make quesadilla's in this VR cooking simulator inspired by the Papa's cooking games made by FlipLine Studio

name: Master of Pieces: Jigsaw Puzzle - Glass Dreams
description: Unique Puzzles Not Found Anywhere Else. These 36 detailed stained glass puzzles will immerse you in a world where the intricate beauty of mesmerizing patterns comes to life.

name: Master of Pieces: Jigsaw Puzzle - Timeless Heritage
description: Step into the past with Timeless Heritage, where every puzzle holds a piece of the history. Enjoy 36 gorgeous puzzles.

name: Master of Pieces: Jigsaw Puzzle - Unknown Worlds
description: Find your favorite puzzle among a pack of 39 wonderful images - from ethereal dreamscapes to whimsical fantasies!

name: Master of Pieces: Jigsaw Puzzle - Whispers of Nature
description: Try 33 detailed pictures with busy backgrounds, ideal for puzzling, immerses you in the beauty of the natural world.

name: Pixel Puzzles The Musical: Chaosbay - Jigsaw Pack
description: Pixel Puzzles Musical, listen to your favorite bands as you puzzle.

name: Pixel Puzzles The Musical: HCK9 - Jigsaw Pack
description: Pixel Puzzles Musical, listen to your favorite bands as you puzzle.

name: Pixel Puzzles The Musical: The Nearly Deads - Jigsaw Pack
description: Pixel Puzzles Musical, listen to your favorite bands as you puzzle.

name: Pixel Puzzles The Musical
description: Pixel Puzzles Musical, listen to your favorite bands as you puzzle.

name: Super Jigsaw Puzzle: Generations - Birds 2
description: Puzzles of Birds!

name: Super Jigsaw Puzzle: Generations - Music
description: Puzzles of music!

name: Super Jigsaw Puzzle: Generations - Red Things
description: Puzzles of Red Things!

name: Tamaniwatori's Puzzle
description: This is a simple and sometimes tricky 3D puzzle game in which the egg-shaped chicken "Tamaniwatori'' hatches eggs. While avoiding the natural enemy "Tamawani", advance on the various scaffolds set up, hatch all the eggs, and aim for the goal.

name: Twizzle Puzzle: Horses
description: Twizzle Puzzle: Horses - is the perfect puzzle game for a fun and rewarding pastime.

name: Puzzle Garden
description: A short, casual puzzle game where you utilize unique land layouts and crop abilities to maximize your profit.

name: Puzzlemazed
description: Classic Arcade, 2D, Puzzle and Mazed, pixel art. Easy to Play, Hard to Complete. Puzzlemazed is one genuine medieval challenge. The ancient lands of Atlas, dominated by three kingdoms. Humans coexisted with the Titans in perfect harmony, Discover the history of one great adventure.

name: Roll: A Puzzle Contraption
description: Roll is a creative puzzle game where you build contraptions out of stickers to roll, fling, and guide a hamster to its goal. Collect stickers as you complete puzzles, then build your own wacky contraptions for Hammy.

name: Stick Robot Puzzle
description: A puzzle game that combines "Slide Puzzle" (you cannot stop until you hit a wall.) and "Sokoban" .

name: Art Jigsaw Puzzles
description: Like jigsaw puzzles? Hundreds of famous painting jigsaw puzzles welcome you to challenge.

name: OG Puzzlers: Spring 2K24
description: OG Puzzlers: Spring 2K24 is an puzzel game with stunning nature pictures . You have to assemble a single image from random generated indivdual pieces. Combine all of the smart singel frames into one big image and unlock the next level.

name: Hidden Cats in Jigsaw Puzzle
description: The beautifully hand-drawn art of the Hidden Cats Series levels from Nukearts is now in a Jigsaw Puzzle game! Enjoy the free content from Paris City and get more from DLCs.

name: Hent-Ai Puzzle
description: 'Hent-ai Puzzle' is a puzzle game with a total of 12 sexy women in clothed, bikini or underwear and nude versions. You can switch between these versions and have a good time with 36 sexy pictures

name: DachStudio Puzzle Box: Mystical Worlds by RiaStarchild
description: 10 beautifully hand drawn mystical worlds from RiaStarchild to puzzle.

name: Let's Puzzle: Verdant Realms Pack
description: Dive into nature-themed designs, from lush forests to majestic mountains, and customize your game with new puzzles, dynamic mouse cursors, serene menu backgrounds, tranquil music, and elegant text fonts. Tailor your gaming environment to your taste, activating and deactivating elements at will.

name: Digital Meow
description: Digital Meow is a vaporwave platformer where a little cat journeys through a digital world to find a new home. Overcome lasers, spikes, and cannons in this nostalgic and challenging adventure!

name: Curse of Dares
description: Frau and her friends talk about how they could not stay the night in a haunted house. Frau doesn't believe in ghosts, so she said she would spend the night alone at an abandoned school nearby to prove that ghosts don't exist.

name: Arenion
description: Explore a giant interconnected world riddled with monsters and machines. Ensnared by the convoluted web spun by a dangerous criminal syndicate hailing from a distant land, you uncover a horrifying secret. Will you yield to their manipulation or rise up to fight for what’s right?

name: Ares Breathes
description: Ares Breathes is a classic survival horror game in which you explore a recently destroyed Martian colony, given shape as a late 90s style low poly game complete with tank controls and static cameras.

name: Arising
description: First person space combat and exploration in an open world in a variety of star systems. Pilot ships, fight, run missions and trade.

name: Art Diff
description: Find the differences between the 2 pictures. Many public domain artworks are used to create the levels. Some levels have animation.

name: Art Dash
description: A short Rouge Like game about shapes and colors, its a shooter about using color to your advantage to pop enemies. Inspired by games like enter the Gungeon and binding of Isaac!

name: Armored Suit Solgante
description: Lieutenant Will, an armored suit pilot, works diligently to combat threats to the nation. Unfortunately, in his struggle to fight against terrorists, he's implicated in one of the very schemes he's fighting against.

name: Armadillo Assault
description: Armadillo Assault is an online multiplayer, action-platformer shooter, inspired by the glory days of couch multiplayer fun. Re-creating the magic of local multiplayer in an online environment, Armadillo Assault offers a unique experience for players looking to have a fun online PvP experience!

name: Arkwhale
description: Arkwhale is a new submarine casual simulator. As the captain of a submarine, you will devise tactics, navigate your vessel, and carry out dangerous missions to annihilate enemies. Experience powerful weapons and advanced underwater technology!

name: Arkhe
description: Arkhe invites you into a visual novel adventure. Join the stoic warrior Derg and the passionate sorceress Agatha on their first joint mission. Step into the roles of both characters, unraveling mysteries and experiencing the story from dual perspectives.

name: Arkham Hotel 77
description: You are trapped in an endless lovecraftian hotel. Observe your surroundings and avoid eldritch anomalies in order to reach the exit.

description: Sin descripción

description: Sin descripción

description: Sin descripción

description: Sin descripción

description: Sin descripción

description: Sin descripción

description: Sin descripción

name: Master of Pieces Jigsaw Puzzles: Reflections. Part 1
description: Sin descripción

name: Hailey's Aesop
description:
Some time, in some country, in some town, there are hundreds if not thousands of people going about their lives, happy and content with who they are. Unfortunately, you are not as lucky.

To whom it concerns, you've described yourself as a homosexual purely out of simplicity. But you know for a fact that it's not that simple. You can't explain it, but there has to be a name for it...

...right?

name: Kenny vs. Spenny: Best Friends/Worst Enemies
description:
Kenny vs. Spenny: Best friends/Worst Enemies is a collection of mini-games for mobile phones based on the popular TV series Kenny vs Spenny.

The mini-games are all based on episodes of the show such as 'Who can win a rat race?', 'Who’s got the biggest balls?' & 'Who can wear an octopus on his head the longest?'.

name: Pixel Puzzles Ultimate: Jigsaw - Variety Pack 4XS
description: Pixel Puzzles Ultimate, redefining digital puzzling.

name: Pixel Puzzles Ultimate: Jigsaw - Variety Pack 21
description: Pixel Puzzles Ultimate, redefining digital puzzling.

description: Sin descripción

description: Sin descripción

description: Sin descripción

name: Pixel Puzzles: Illustrations & Anime - Jigsaw Pack: Deadswitch 3
description: Sin descripción

name: UnderKingdom
description: This is a top-down automatic shooting light ROGUE game. You will use various fruits to fight. Pick up the fruits to destroy the enemies!

name: Up! The Floor Is Lava
description: Escape from the Lava, eliminate your opponents with Kicks and Punches. Be the one who reaches the highest in each round and show who is the Best.

name: Gnomes 'n Giants
description: Run from towering Giants. Flee from vicious predators. Scavenge what yee can from the mana-blessed overworld and scurry back to yone burrow. For yee are a Gnome, the lowest of the low…but maybe one day…with the Gnome King crowned, yee will return as conquers.

name: Because The World Died
description: Retro pixel art role-playing game in a harsh and dark world, focused on survival and understanding your past. Why? Because The World Died. Features include nonlinear plot with many viable endings, dark humor and text-based combat (no animations).

name: Watching Paint Dry: Too
description: A comedy based FPS. Interesting maps, modes, and secrets

name: Painted In Blood
description: Trapped in the haunting realm of an artist's twisted nightmare, engage in intense combat with grotesque enemies and monsters, experience unpredictable horror events that unfold dynamically, seamlessly blends classic retro FPS elements with modern elements.

name: S.T.A.R.W.I.E.L.D.
description: S.T.A.R.W.I.E.L.D. is finally here! Embark on an exhilarating space journey where you'll explore the surface of a mysterious planet on a motorcycle, complete thrilling missions, and battle formidable foes!

name: Overall The Ball
description: Overall The Ball is a party game played locally, or online, from 2 to 4 players. Bounce a giant ball and eat your friends , play as colorful characters, use your abilities to take advantage and score points! Become the master of the arena!

name: Really Simple Golf
description: Really Simple Golf is a climbing platformer golf, that blends chill vibes with precision driven adventure. Embark on an adventure across vibrant courses, mastering tricky shoots, navigating obstacles, and sinking those perfect putts.

name: Where Are We?
description: Trapped in an unknown space for unknown reasons, the two adventurers must now turn their teamwork for finding treasure into one for survival and escape! Will adventurers escape from the unknown space and get treasure again?

name: Beyond Tenmei
description: Roll dice, then cheat the dice with magic! Foil foes and trigger powerful talent synergies in this simple-but-deep twist on the turn-based RPG.

name: Beyond Reason
description: Beyond reason is a knowledge-based time-loop game about surviving a tiny open world. Master fluid first person combat, while uncovering the island's secrets. When you die, you take nothing but your knowledge of the world into the next loop.

name: ButteredLilly's Random Quotes & Avatar Remote
description: In this clicker game, players are provided words of wisdom, inspiration and questionable humor with every click. ButteredLilly's Avatar Remote & Quote Generator features a simple mechanic where you click a button, and a new random user suggested quote is displayed on the screen.

name: Byte Survivor
description: Enter the world of gaming and earn! Earn a living through a game that mines cryptocurrency, acquire new PCs and avatars, and obtain better rewards. It is a top-down, roguelike action game.

name: Cabin Corpse
description: Cabin Corpse is a story-driven adult horror visual novel. Filled with suspenseful story telling, compelling characters and a dash of mature themes.

name: Calamity
description: Survive disasters in Calamity! Explore a chaotic city, dodge deadly disasters, and escape before time’s up. Fast, frantic, and fun—can you stay alive during apocalyptic disasters?

name: Cage of Roses
description: A haunting gothic romance set in the 19th century. Follow Meike, a young woman from an impoverished noble family, as she’s swept off her feet by the mysterious Magdalena: a vampire who possesses a dark secret.

name: Calangos e Coxinhas
description: Manage your stocks, organize your resources, cook snacks and make friendships.

name: CaliaQuest
description: CaliaQuest is an erotic hypnosis roleplaying game where you are the brave hero, on a quest for the Princess. Can you make it through six chapters full of branching paths, monster girls, and seductive women and complete your quest, or will you fall in love along the way?

name: Cats War
description: Cat war where you kill the other cat to win, kill the cats and earn points.

name: Chillax
description: Play mini games while enjoying the sight of sea creatures.

name: Cat & Butterfly
description: Cat & Butterfly is a side-scrolling runner with pixel graphics and roguelike mechanics. The Cat is lost in its thoughts when a Butterfly flies by. The cute feline cannot help but chase the colorful insect and gets carried away in pursuit.

name: Catch Thieves
description: Feeling stuck in the same old routine and craving some excitement?

name: Catffee Time!
description: By night, you're a stealthy rescuer saving stray cats in the suburbs; by day, a cat café owner, decorating, stocking up, and serving food. Dispatch unique cats to boost your rating and breed special breeds for competitions. Ready to make your café globally known?

name: Catwave95
description: Catwave95 is a music puzzle game set in retro-futuristic cyberspace

name: Chiccoo and Life
description: In the hills by the river is a small village of handful souls. Chiccoo the raccoon walks through them and their past lives discovering their joys and sorrows. Spend your time in an idyllic rustic environment unlocking the villagers' memories and solving environmental puzzles.

name: ChingMing
description: As a Taoist from the Heavenly Master's Mansion, you will come down the mountain to experience various demons and monsters on this land. You need to personally build a camp, search for food, establish defenses, and do everything you can to survive.

name: Chip & Sparky
description: Embark on a high-octane adventure with a young robot named Chip, as he teams up with his trusty companion Sparky to track down corporate pirates who have stolen his uncle's latest invention. Blast through action-packed levels, master high-tech gadgets, and overcome thrilling obstacles!

name: Chooing
description: The electrifying fusion of Snake and tank battle! Engage in blistering battles as you obliterate your foes with a barrage of firepower or outmaneuver them with foxy tactics.

name: Christmas Countdown
description: Join Santa's elves in a festive race against time to wrap presents and fill Santa's sleigh before Christmas Eve in this fun and cheerful game for the whole family.

name: Chronicles of Fear: The Babysitter's Tale
description: Psychological horror game without any jumpscares. Take care of Samuel, the neighbour’s kid, in this realistic singleplayer walking simulator and uncover family secrets.

name: College Basketball Manager
description: Take charge as head coach in College Basketball Manager. Recruit your dream team, whether that be through All-Americans or hidden gems. Strategize gameplay, schedule games, run practices, and manage your staff, because you are in control. The court is your canvas – create a powerhouse.

name: Comet Angel
description: Comet Angel is a sci-fi visual novel with point and click puzzles. Help the mysterious alien Faerie return home by bringing it the food it needs to fly, and help Izzy and Nat learn to understand themselves and each other.

name: ComplexToe
description: Strategize boldly, move swiftly, and unlock the potential of intricate thought!

name: Cosmic Outpost
description: Cosmic Outpost is a turn-based strategy game where you build an outpost on a new planet. As pioneers, you will construct an outpost while defending against enemies. Gather enough materials to build a spaceship to explore new worlds and expand humanity's frontiers!

name: Cosmotots
description: A frantic third-person Team Deathmatch arena shooter. Flank your enemies using hidden teleporters, tunnels, and floating islands. First team to 30 takes the glory. Get your loadout ready, engage in intense matches, and conquer the stars!

name: Covert Crew
description: A Superpowered SRPG! Covert Crew is a 2D strategic roleplaying game inspired by the classics of old with a modern twist.

name: Retrieval
description: Retrieval is a cinematic horror and action-adventure game. The plot follows the experiences of Hana Loshe, a commander of a research team on a planet 18.6 billion miles away from Earth. Hana Loshe will fall by accident in a subway base where she will discover all the horrors that the base hides.

name: Plants vs Zombies: Garden Warfare - Garden Variety
description: The Garden Variety Pack features 24 new ability upgrades for all characters, like Sunflower’s Solar Flare Beam, Chomper’s Super Goop that cements zombies in place, and the All-Star Zombie’s Ultra Tackle. These awesome upgrades give you even more loadout options for the battle in the fun-dead field! The pack also introduces the explosive new Gnome Bomb mode that challenges plants and zombies to work together to destroy each other’s reinforced garden or graveyard! There’s a funtastic new map to explore, and a yo-ho host of fresh Pirate Zombies for players to face in Sharkbite Shores and Port Scallywag, including a Map Pirate Zombie who shields himself with a trusty treasure map. Shooters just got weirder!

name: Fiskal Clif
description: Live the American dream. Ride to success.

name: 60 Seconds to Park
description: Birds-eye car parking simulator.

name: Pizza Boy
description:
A thief has stolen the pizza present! Oh no! You are forced to chase it through levels filled with threats and dangers but to your advantage you can throw bottles of soda. Watch out for evil birds and furious dogs while you collect pizza slices and strawberries in a yummy mix. And don’t forget to keep an eye out for lost kittens on your way ahead. In miraculous surroundings Pizza Boy is a true retro game sensation.
Hurry and get it back before it runs cold!

name: Jumpmaster
description: Private Dios is a paratrooper who is on a secret assault mission. He has to survive from violent enemies offensive in the sky and complete this challenging airborne operation. What he is going to face in the battlefield? You have his destiny in control. Get ready to jump, soldiers!

name: WhiteWater 3D
description: Fun, fast paced down river whitewater kayaking game. Race against friends or go solo and unlock new kayaks and discover new unique items for your character. Fun trick / stunt mechanics and real water physics simulation make this river runner a frantic fantastic game to play with friends and family.

name: A Game About My Cat
description: Go for high scores and do tricks as you sled the legendary slopes of Mt. Kittimanjaro. Also includes a laser pointer toy for your cat.

name: Abysus Arena
description: Abysus Arena is a Cartoon Network online game. It uses the Unity Web Player.

name: Clay God
description:
Before you is a set of cards. Every card holds a scene. Every card is a piece of the puzzle. The choice of which ones you flip is yours.

You will experience the scenes of this tale in a random order. By the end, all players will have the same information -- but the journey to them is bound to be different for everyone.

name: Before the Needle Lifts
description: You and your girlfriend Sayori investigate a series of strange disappearances around your town.

name: Ace Attorney But Plotagon
description: A Pywright Adaption of the "Phoenix Wright But Plotagon" Youtube series.

name: Phoenix Wright: Ace Attorney - Tails Abuse In Court
description: An Ace Attorney fan game based on Whoisthisgit's Tails Abuse In Court videos

name: Downfall to the Turnabout
description: The case takes place about half a year after the events of Apollo Justice: Ace Attorney. Apollo has had a few cases (mostly arranged by Phoenix) after the test trial, but nothing worth noting. However, when Phoenix gives him a call about a new case, Apollo has no idea that that would be the beginning of his eternal downfall.

name: Heisei Kyouiku Iinkai Jr. Mezase Yuutousei
description: Sega Pico game based on the Heisei Kyouiku Iinkai's game show.

name: Unou Kaihatsu Series 10 Nontan to Issho Wai-wai Nippon
description: Sin descripción

name: Sanou Kaihatsu Series 1 Zukei Ninshiki
description: Sin descripción

name: Sanou Kaihatsu Series 2: Suuryou, Keisan
description: Sin descripción

name: Sanou Kaihatsu Series 3: Hikaku, Bunrui
description: Sin descripción

name: Sanou Kaihatsu Series 4: Suiri, Kousei
description: Sin descripción

name: Sanou Kaihatsu Series 5: Meiro, Kioku
description: Sin descripción

name: Sanou Kaihatsu Series 6 Ouyou Mondai
description: Sin descripción

name: PyWright Tutorial
description: An interactive casemaker tutorial made in PyWright.

name: ShowMeSpeed
description: 2D Single / Multiplayer speedrunning / racing platformer, enriched with items and timer.

name: A New World Of Turnabouts
description: Two young rookies face off against each other in the courtroom, both on their first case, and both familiar with each other. What starts off as a simple case of murder, soon becomes a dark plot that ties in to a case from 12 years past. The prosecutor seems to know more about the situation than the others, and soon finds himself having to fight a demon related to his past...

name: Ace Attorney Online: The Game
description: A Pywright game that replicates the Ace Attorney Online experience.

name: Myles Wright: Ace Attorney
description: 23 years after the events of Spirit of Justice, a new defense attorney steps up to the plate. Myles Wright, the son of Phoenix Wright, has finally achieved his dream of continuing his father's legacy. With his attorney badge proudly pinned on his lapel, he jumps on the first cases he can get. Unfortunately, his eagerness comes back to haunt him as he's thrown into a series of events that turn his world inside-out. With a serial killer hot on his trail, can Myles live up to his father's namesake? Or will he fall, just like Phoenix Wright did 8 years ago?

name: Jack Mason: Ace Attorney
description: We play as Jack Mason, an old friend of Phoenix Wright that traveled to his country to finally meet him, after a long time and finishing his law studies. He was told to rendezvous in an unusual place: a courtroom lobby? And, apparently, there's also a trial today? What? A certain Larry Butz was arrested for car theft and murder!? But he doesn't even own a license!

name: Nemo
description: A collection of picross puzzles for PICO-8.

name: Nemo: Puzzle Pack II
description: More picross puzzles for PICO-8.

name: Time Pilot Demake
description: A PICO-8 demake of the classic Konami arcade game Time Pilot (1982).

name: Rewilder
description: Rewilder branches out from Match 3 conventions with a blend of strategic puzzle solving, and a zen-like meditative ambiance. Help Naia, the island's defender, harness nature's strength by tracing paths though matching flora and create Essence Links, which you'll use to cleanse contaminated habitats, and turn frenzied creatures into cute allies. You'll adapt to game-changing hazards and discover new creatures to re-populate the restored habitats!

name: Bakuten Shoot Beyblade 2002: Beybattle Tournament 2
description: Bakuten Shoot Beyblade 2002 - Beybattle Tournament 2 was a game released on the Sony Playstation. It was launched on August 1, 2002 in Japan. The game is a continuation of Beyblade: Let it Rip!

name: Love Affairs
description:
Your Choice can lead you to every Ending!
Romance, Drama, Mystery, Thriller and More!

Love Affairs, romantic interactive story game with your choices, is now ★open★!

Multiple story games within one, Love Affairs!

name: Flirting Island
description:
“Catch the heart of a millionaire!”
Flirting Island, a stimulating love reality show that the world is paying attention to.
A dazzling and steamy romance unfolds on a beautiful island!

name: Girl in the B.L
description: I am looking at the novel I wrote? Authentic romance fantasy man hell!

name: Andalusian Roulette
description: A game about sleeping siesta in a small rural village in Spain while socializing with some odd fellows.

name: Repair Plane
description: Repair broken pieces and install new one if necessary to get ready for the fly! Enjoy repairing cargo plane, business jet, fighter, jet, helicopter and many aircrafts..

name: Midsummer Leg's Dream
description: Enter a whimsical dreamscape where every step reveals a new surprise. Level up to uncover short, unexpected clips. Embrace the quirky journey of a leg in a world where dreams and reality blur — exactly as it should be.

name: Trench Warfare WW1: RTS Battle
description: As a WWI general, command your army across trenches in the Eastern Front and Western Front, experiencing real-life historical battles as both the Allies and Central powers. Engage in real time strategy (RTS) where your objective is to select the right combination of soldiers and tanks to conquer the enemy trenches. Survive wave upon wave of enemy soldiers as they try to gain supremacy and use tactical artillery strikes to support your army. Choose your side from a variety of WWI nations including the British, Germans, French, and Ottoman military. Simulate battles such as Somme, Verdun, and Gallipoli, experiencing total war. In Trench Warfare WWI your goal is to gain supremacy by capturing the enemy trenches and seeing your nations flag wave in the wind. Use RTS strategy and battle alongside your allies army in the trenches of total war!

name: TalkTics: Double Served
description: This light-hearted summer comedy game invites you to talk to people and make it to the end as fast as you can. Step into the whimsical world of Alice and Nick, navigating the quirky challenges of modern life with special charm.

name: Moves Away
description: Moves Away is a psychological horror. The story is told from the perspective of Dave, an ordinary man who bought an auto repair shop.

name: Memories of Bust
description: Dive into a thrilling roguelike deckbuilder where strategy meets chance! Use your own deck to beat your foes in a Blackjack-inspired combat system. Push your luck in a procedurally generated dungeon where every draw could be your last. Will you gamble your way to victory or fold under pressure?

name: FindIt
description: Try to find all the hidden objects, left clicking on them to collect them. The goal is to find all the objects to finish the level, or the episode.

name: FindIt: Bonus Maps 1
description: This DLC includes another 5 special maps, extremely cool and beautiful, which will make you love the game even more, and a few more new objects to look for.

name: Thalassophobia
description: As a cataclysmic event rocks the planet, you find yourself in an old, decrepit submarine tasked with only one goal: survive. Manage the internal systems to keep yourself alive and fend off undersea horrors as they attempt to cut your journey short.

name: Sausage Legend: Arena
description: Sausage Legend is a 3D physics-based fighting game where players clash their sausages in battle. You take on the role of a medieval slave, forced to fight in the "Sausage Duel," a pastime of the nobility. To gain your freedom, you must emerge victorious in this mad contest.

name: Equiverse
description: Experience the ultimate ecosystem simulator! Equiverse is a cozy simulation game where you care for different species of animals, earn income by keeping them happy, unlock helpful companions, and defend against invading monsters. Can you keep your ecosystem thriving?

name: Treepury
description: TREEPURY is a game where you hire adventurers, deploy them to production buildings, and defeat monsters to make your guild bigger and better.

name: Catan: Console Edition - Complete Collection
description: Gather your friends and family together for the CATAN: Complete Collection! This definitive edition includes the core game of CATAN, the strategic depth of The Helpers expansion, and the captivating complexity of Cities & Knights. Whether you're a seasoned player or a newcomer to the world of CATAN, this comprehensive collection guarantees endless hours of thrilling competition, cunning negotiation, and strategic conquest. Elevate your tabletop adventures to new heights and forge your path to victory with the Complete Collection of CATAN.

name: Butanooo! Simulator
description:
How are you, Paco? How are you? It's me Er Pelusa.
You told me that if I knew of any job to let you know, so I got you a good job.

name: NBA Now 22
description: Com2Us has just released a brand new officially licensed NBA game called NBA Now 22, as a basketball simulator of sorts, where players can choose from their favorite teams and recruit their dream players to create powerful squads and serve their opponents on the court. In essence, this game is similar to FIFA Mobile, especially in the fact that your players are represented by cards that you can obtain, and the matches themselves are very short and focus only on pivotal moments of the game, such as rebounds, steals, blocks, and scoring opportunities.

name: NBA Now
description:
If you loved NBA then, you’ll love NBA NOW. Build your championship team and become the greatest All-star, GM, coach of all time.

This title was delisted from Mobile stores following the release of NBA Now 22, in which future NBA Seasons would be continually added to.

name: Dynasty Warriors: Origins
description: Experience an unrivaled sense of realism on the battlefield, fueled by exhilarating 1 vs. 1,000 action and the rush of massive armies! A nameless hero conquers the turbulent and chaotic Three Kingdoms in this latest DYNASTY WARRIORS series entry.

name: Ballad of Antara
description:
In a distant land, a mist-like phenomenon devastates the common world with unknown malice. Begin a perilous journey, seek towering, divine creatures, retrieve those twisted and lost ""essences"" of the land.

-Become Emissaries, powerful entities that wield the force of fundamental essences. Experience unique classes, gameplay capabilities, and enticing, mysterious stories.
-Explore the Para, the otherworldly dimension where danger lurks at every corner. Seek the truth inside, and recover the essences of the world.
-Explore handcrafted gameplay space with intricate, exploration oriented level design.

name: Astro Bot
description: Buckle up for some epic PlayStation camaraderie, join forces with your favourite PlayStation icons and show the universe that small is mighty in this fresh new Astro adventure, exclusive to PS5 consoles!

name: B.O.B.2
description: Part two of the B.O.B. saga! This time you need to jump from left to right in order to squeeze through the tiny gap between the lasers!

name: Silent Hill 2: Deluxe Edition
description: Deluxe Edition - Contents: SILENT HILL 2, Digital Artbook, Digital Soundtrack, and Pyramid Head Mask (pizza box).

name: Legend of the Time Sword: Episode 1
description: You awaken in a strange place. A giant floating head has brought you here and commands you to get a legendary "blade thingy". As soon as you touch the sword you realize that you are able to travel back in time to help your past self to solve the strange puzzles lying ahead in a watery dungeon.

name: Salt Meat Factory
description:
You are working in a Salt Meat Factory.

Your job is it to put the meat in boxes.

Make sure to bring honor to the factory by working as hard as you can!

name: Hunter
description: You find yourself in a crowded city in the feature. An evil android is on the run and it is your job to hunt him and shoot him down! You only have ten bullets left and he is somewhere in this crowd of people.

name: Ludical
description:
Your soul is trapped in lines of code. What will you do?

Thanks to science you can now upload the consciousness of a human being inside a computer. The Gametoy which is the first fully immersive Video Game Console is finally out to the public! In which reality and digital video games collide. The lives of many can now last forever in a computer.

However, something goes terribly wrong with all the consoles across the entire globe. The minds of young and old have been trapped in all the machines. You the child of an employee that works at a company called "Technologic" must figure out what went wrong with the system. As you multitask beating video game levels and avoiding the dreaded rouge AIs that resemble nightmarish versions of what it is like to have a family. You will soon realize no one is to be trusted.

name: Unicorn Senpai Slap
description:
An arcade game where you slap unicorns in the future. #insanityjam

The game was made during four days for the Insanity Jam 2014.

name: Bikkuriman Wonder Collection
description: A new mobile game in the Bikkuriman series!

name: Pokémon Frienda
description: Sin descripción

name: Shootinator
description:
Just shoot the living hell out of the incoming ships and watch some pinkish 80sness...

Nothing more...

name: Story of Seasons: Untitled 2024
description: A new title for the Story of Seasons series to be released in 2024.

name: Pyrphoros
description: You landed on a strange moon on a rescue mission to find survivors from a crash that happened a few weeks ago.

name: Boomadrons Bouncyverse Rebound
description: Bounce around in Pinballcity as Boomadron and destroy the evil Robots.

name: Beezooka
description: You are a humblebee with a bazooka full of pollen! Now it is up to you to pollinate the flowers in the garden around you in true "Beezooka" style. Also: while you are at it, try to defend them from the evil bugs.

name: OMD, Noobs!
description: "OMD, NOOBS!" is a small Arena Shooter I made during a weekend. It is inspired by DOOM, Quake and in general the Arena Shooter genre. The artstyle is loosely based on NES limitations but not completely.

name: Stark Zero
description: A little prototype inspired by Sonic, Mega Man and F Zero. It is in a very early and unpolished state but I hope you enjoy it! :) I started this game back in 2014, before I came up with Macbat 64. :D

name: Super Fists
description: Beat up your enemies with your mighty fist and improve your power level. Enemies can do the same and in the end, only the mightiest shall be victorious and win this tournament of strength! Or something like that! :D

name: Truncheon Titties
description: A Dark Medieval Porn game centered around exhibitionism, big ole titties, abuse of authority, blowjobs, spanking, bullying and revenge. Join the Royal Guard and fight against the criminal scum. Make your choice to show your tits or swing that truncheon!

name: Daisy Dangerous
description: A 2D puzzle and precision platformer based on the 1989's classic, Rick Dangerous.

name: Project: Emplorer
description: You are the pilot of a micro-robot that travels through tissues, collecting 'samples' from the cells it kills and harvesting samples more efficiently.

name: Astrune Academy
description: A fantasy RPG of a tale of fighting magical girls!

name: A Sunday Afternoon
description: Help the insecure Lucas, and his sassy best friend Carol, explore a watercolored São Paulo and solve puzzles to complete a sticker album to gift his secret crush, Leo, in this cute-as-heck visual novel!

name: Level Up: The Playable Rap Album
description: The one of a kind 2D side-scrolling adventure that combines action-packed gameplay with a hip-hop album. Created by a 2 time Ninja Warrior and Nerdcore Rapper Creative Mind Frame get ready to immerse yourselves in a lyrical hip hop journey through an immersive 16-bit experience.

name: Momochiyo's Mononoke Taji
description: Ninja Puzzle Battle

name: Nether Heroes
description: Immerse yourself in Nether Heroes, an intense action-platform roguelike game. Conquer challenging dungeons, face menacing creatures, and defeat powerful bosses on your epic adventure.

name: Tipsy Woods
description: Enter a pixelated nightmare as you navigate a haunting forest in search of 8 bottles, all while evading a relentless monster. Can you survive the terror and escape?

name: Sparedevil
description: Sparedevil is an arcade FPS with the graphic charm of classic '90s bowling alley animations.

name: The Rule of She
description: A soul about to be reborn mistakenly enters a world of strange tales filled with rules. Beware! This place is fraught with danger, and to successfully complete the rebirth, you must follow the rules of this world. The world will correct any soul that violates the rules. Will you comply or defy?

name: Trilingual
description: Welcome to the planet, Triangulus. Can you solve the hidden mysteries of each island and escape with your brain intact? Scan these ancient runes to decode a new alien language. Use this alien language to grow plants, move trains, and even save the Trilings of the planet.
