name: Arcade Archives: Cue Brick
description:
"CUE BRICK" is a puzzle game released by KONAMI in 1989.
The goal is to move the bricks that make up the ground to form a path for all of the balls to follow. There's no escaping this game once you get hooked. It has a total of 101 thrilling puzzles ready to entrance your brain!

name: Hentai Girls: Ultra Deluxe
description: Sin descripción

name: Mixx Island: Remix Plus - Ultra Ultimate
description: Sin descripción

name: Kingdom Hearts Magical Puzzle Clash
description: Kingdom Hearts Magical Puzzle Clash, stylized as Kingdom Hearts 358/2 Days Magical Puzzle Clash, was an online flash game released to the Disney website by Square Enix and Disney. It has since been discontinued and is no longer officially accessible. The game was made to promote Kingdom Hearts 358/2 Days and is not canon to the series in any way.

name: Urban Trace: Parkour Simulator Pursuit
description:
Urban Trace: Parkour Simulator Pursuit offers you an exhilarating and adrenaline-pumping parkour experience that will keep you on the edge of your seat from start to finish. Navigate through intricate urban environments, overcome challenging obstacles, and evade the clutches of the authorities in this captivating experience.

Are you ready to test your limits?

name: Summer Games Beach Volley
description:
Dive into the heart of the Summer Games Tournament with this Beach Volley game
Experience the thrill of competition as you vie for the coveted gold medal in intense beach volleyball matches.

name: Sugoi Girls: Lovely Wife
description: Meet over 50 pretty anime girls in this relaxing puzzle game!

name: Rider's Spirits
description: Are you ready to display your riding skills?

name: Boing Boing
description: An exciting bouncy experience! Combine delights to create bigger and sweeter ones. Aim for the pudding!

name: Cyberpunk Paradise Elysium: The Visual Novel
description: In a dystopian future, a journalist investigates disappearances and faces a corporation trying to hide the truth. Can Alex reveal the dark reality before it is too late?

name: Lesson Learned
description: Help Frank travel through history in this unique approach to the tower defense genre. Enter a bizarre daydream world in co-op or solo mode. Gather resources, build defense towers, and manage your minions.

name: Planetarian: The Reverie of a Little Planet & Snow Globe
description: Visual novel studio Key's sci-fi tale "planetarian: The Reverie of a Little Planet" and its prequel "planetarian: Snow Globe" now available as a single package!

name: Operation Scorpion: Take Down
description: A single-player FPS game that fights against terrorists around the world! Defeat your enemies and get your weapons! Weapons that excite military fans!

name: Bomb Cat: Wild Cat Mode
description: Sin descripción

name: Crypt Stalker: Boss Rush+
description: Sin descripción

name: Crypt Stalker: Extra Quests
description: Sin descripción

name: Ngolf: Colorful Golf Balls 1
description: Sin descripción

name: Naruto x Boruto: Ultimate Ninja Storm Connection - DLC Pack 3
description: A DLC pack containing additional content for NARUTO X BORUTO Ultimate Ninja STORM CONNECTIONS.

name: Big Top Best Kids Games Bundle
description: 17 of the best Games for Children in one big games collection bundle. The ultimate top educational and fun to play game pack for kids and toddlers.

name: Car Games for Kids & Toddlers Bundle 3 in 1
description: Children's games collection with the best 3 car games for Kids age 1 to 10

name: Simulation Platinum Bundle: Bus Construction Firefighting Lawn Mowing
description: The Simulation Platinum Bundle includes Construction Simulator 4, Bus Simulator City Ride, Firefighting Simulator - The Squad and Lawn Mowing Simulator. CONSTRUCTION SIMULATOR 4 Construction Simulator returns to Nintendo Switch!

name: Ultimate Children Fun Pack Games Collection 6 in 1
description: The perfect game collection for children aged 1 to 12! Featuring 6 high-quality and educational McPeppergames titles designed specifically for kids

name: S.N.I.P.E.R.: Hunter Scope - Ultimate Firepower
description: Sin descripción

name: Minimalist Tower Defense: The Last Tower
description: After the Battle of the Britain, the war to eliminate geometric creations continues Mount Fuji, Cape Storm, Bering Strait, New York And the ultimate goal: the South Pole...

name: Harem Nanka Nozondenai!: Undesired Harem
description: A sudden harem situation?! His heart must decide between 4 beautiful girls!

name: Koishi Adventure: Barrage Forbidden - Scarlet!
description: Twenty years ago, a red mist mutation occurred in Lotusland, Hakurei Reimu traveled to quell the revolt! This time Reimu decided to take only a *machete* and her beloved yin and yang jade!

name: ZomGoBo
description: ZomGoBo is a shooter game where the goal is to increase character skills and escape from the dungeon. Once the character is fully built up, the high-score mode is unlocked, where the objective is to achieve as many points as possible.

name: The Sims 4: Riviera Retreat Kit
description: Bask in the rustic scenery surrounding your secluded, peaceful pool with The Sims 4 Riviera Retreat Kit.

name: The Sims 4: Cozy Bistro Kit
description: Stop by your favorite hole-in-the-wall bistro and take in the antique ambiance of The Sims 4 Cozy Bistro Kit.
The game consists of finishing several levels, solving by clicking with the mouse or using the keyboard to complete the tasks.

name: AI Fightclub
description: Create the world's strongest AI by customizing appearance, attack method, attack timing, and other factors

name: Alister In Wonderland
description: Welcome to wonderland, a place of dreams. Take on the role of Alister Hinch and go on a journey through this surreal realm of enchantment and wonder. Experience making friends in this realm... Now, what ending will you choose to have?

name: A Little Space
description: A casual, 2D space game about taking some time for yourself while paving humanity's way to a new world. Fly your way through a variety of bite-sized levels: dodge asteroids, power up satellites and even play football (soccer) in space!

name: Apocalyptic cat
description: Apocalyptic Cat is an atmospheric hardcore platformer about a little black cat's journey in a post-apocalyptic world. Overcome toxic clouds, spikes, and obstacles, striving to fulfill his last dream of reaching paradise.

name: Artovya
description: Dive into the bizarre land of Artovya in a thrilling CCG! Master five distinct factions—Fantasy, Alien, Futuristic, Horror, and Interdimensional. Forge your strategy with unique mechanics and thrilling battles across fantastical realms. Unleash your creativity, build your deck, and dominate!

name: A Ruthless World
description: Embark on an adventure through a ruthless, 80s-inspired platformer world.

name: Asbak
description: Asbak is a hack n' slash action roguelike platformer. Exorcise the demons lurking in urban Indonesia. BE FEARLESS!

name: Asili Forest
description: Asili Forest: Guide V12 on a heroic quest to save humanity in this visually stunning 2D platformer adventure, Embark on an epic journey with V12 in Asili Forest, where nature and technology collide in a captivating tale of bravery and discovery.

name: A Tale of Sand and Bone
description: A Tale of sand and Bone is a story-rich action-roguelike adventure. You play as Shai, a fallen warrior bound to a vengeful spirit as you climb and fight your way to claiming vengeance against the gods.

name: Atlas Online
description: Welcome to Atlas Online, the 2D MMORPG pirate game! In this exciting pirate adventure, fight for your own glory, conquer islands with your alliance, embark on new adventures, and rule the seas!

name: Atomic Exile
description: Atomic Exile is a top down post-apocalyptic extraction shooter set in the desert wastelands of near future America. You will visit enclaves, explore devastated ruins and encounter NPCs such as other survivors, raiders, mutated beasts and rogue machines.

name: Atomic Warfare
description: Atomic Warfare is a thrilling and strategic game that allows players to represent a country in a high-stakes battle.

name: Auto Clicker Pro
description: Auto Clicker Pro, easy setup and operation, customizable X-Y positions, adjustable click intervals, fast performance without freezing or lag, ideal for gaming and personal use, achieving up to 130 clicks per second with a record

name: Automata Streetcar
description: An interactive, digital-media art project that uses historic streetcars as a metaphor to explore ideas about connection, communication, and community. Primarily intended for gallery / museum installations - or you can build your own Arduino-based controllers to play at home!

name: Azaran: Islands of the Jinn
description: An N64-style adventure inspired by Arabian Nights. Explore dungeons, solve puzzles, collect awesome treasures, and unlock the mystery of the Jinn.

name: Awagame
description: Explore the world's oceans with a sea turtle that has the ability to inflate bubbles! Bubbles can be used as bullets or shields. But be careful not to over-inflate the bubbles and suffocate! Watch your timing and jump out of the water to breathe. Turtles are lung-breathers.

name: Avian Colony
description: Avian Colony is a survival simulation game that places you in the role of the ruler of a floating colony in a harsh sky world. Your main goal is to ensure the survival and prosperity of your colony by managing resources, planning strategically, and defending against threats.

name: A Very Dark Ride in the Proximity of the House of Mirrors
description: A vewy scawy horror, adventure PCVR game played through the eyes of Eve, a little girl with a big imagination. Run, hide, swim and scream your way into her horrible nightmares while navigating through surreal worlds and creatures. Puzzles, stealth, games and fame await you. Try not to wake up!

name: Board Wars: Trick Or Treat
description: Board Wars ToT is a couch-op, local multiplayer board game intended for family/friend game nights. Take turns rolling dice to manually RUN across the board to Trick-Or-Treat and deliver more candy than the other players!

name: Nine Treasures of Liuyin
description: This is a dark, soul like role-playing game, trying to create a different experience in this genre. The protagonist fights against a powerful enemy in this city in search of a divine artifact.

name: Rubedo: The Occult Dawn
description: Open-world RPG with turn-based combat. As the Last Alchemist, tasked to unleash forbidden chaos magic into the world, perform occult rituals, master ancient spells, and awaken spirits—vile or merciful. Evade the realm's harsh anti-witchcraft edicts and restore the tradition of mystery and magic.

name: Nightmare in the Old Mansion
description: "Nightmare in the Old Mansion" is a first-person indie horror game where John, a real estate agent, receives a call to evaluate an old mansion and will have to fight for his life.

name: Whistling Waters
description: Catch as many fish on as possible to meet your boss' quota and avoid damaging your steamboat.

name: Battle Babes: Love & Death
description: Battle Babes is a fast-paced strategy trading card game. Collect, strategize, and battle your way to victory with 9 powerful hero decks! Experiment with 300+ unique cards each with their own special abilities. Customize your decks and defeat the Succubus Queen's Court!

name: Sayo
description: A world where snow falls, a landscape of dream-like memories.

name: Lizard Slayer
description: Evil anthropomorphic lizards have attacked your lands. You need to solve this problem. Choose a character and go slash lizards!

name: I Commissioned Some Bunnies 7
description: I paid artists to hide bunnies and carrots in 15 artworks. Can you find them all? Warning: Relaxing.

name: Vojna
description: A soldier searches for documents in a desolate zone at night. Suddenly, a voice on the radio, claiming to be a fallen enemy, warns that any negotiation error could awaken evil forces in the forest.

name: The Gap
description: An abstract interactive experience about a Gap

name: The Aching Aversion
description: A 3D RPGMaker Horror game about exploring a weird bunker. The bunker will have different horrors waiting in it depending on how you broke into it! 7 different routes to 9 unique endings! An ending collecting game!

name: Beer Simulator
description: You are single? You have a very hard work and small salary? Then this game is just for you. In this game you can earn beer just by clicking on beer. Upgrade your beer, sell your beer, earn gold, purchase more beer without becoming an actual alcoholic.

name: Basket Brawl DX
description: Embark on a quest with Himari and her friends! Traverse 40+ rooms, unlock characters, and groove to chiptune tunes in this speedy platformer.

name: The Dungeons Of Algoduul
description: Delay your death for as long as possible after finding yourself trapped in a neatly kept Dungeon full of skeletons without legs! Use your Fireballs, Powers, Physics and even use your enemies against each other as you stumble through your very own well lit purgatory!

name: Beneath the Cardboard: Be Happy
description: You will have to survive the cold New Year's Eve, look for food in the trash in the world where no one cares about you. This is an adventure where you have to survive Christmas, a holiday that has never been so cold before...

name: Bot Loop
description: Embark on a roguelike turn-based adventure where simulations become your battleground. Possess a powerful robot, face the Glitch and navigate an ever-evolving loop of challenges.

name: Re:Agent
description: Take on the role of Agent 314, a spy with a secret mission in the rival nation of Ophidia. Explore a dystopian society, confront ethical dilemmas, and tackle tactical challenges. Can you uncover the hidden truth behind the facade and complete your mission before it's too late?

name: Starduster
description: STARDUSTER is a musical and arcade game wrapped in an abstract aesthetic with neon lights designed for players who enjoy difficult challenges and seek to push their own limits.

name: Crisis in the Kremlin: The Cold War
description: PERESTROIKA - CONTINUATION OF OCTOBER Crisis... Crisis has caught up with the Motherland of the Revolution and lurks in its very heart - the Kremlin. Lead the country through the most difficult times. "Crisis in the Kremlin" opens up huge prospects for you.

name: Exohub
description: You will find yourself on the edge of space, on one of the space stations. A place where travelers, research scientists, traders and adventurers from all corners of the galaxy gather. But is everything so safe?

name: Scunner's Run
description: A fast, twin-stick shooter micro-roguelike with bullet hell elements, chunky weapons and satisfying destruction. Your AI friend AL-4N will help you along the way with new weapons, upgrades and vague moral support, as you attempt to beat the Scunner's Run.

name: Necromancer For A Week
description: Reanimate monsters, choose their ideal moveset and form the perfect 3-monster-team to dominate the competition in this turn-based strategy roguelike. Use action points each turn on brutal combos and strategic positioning to be crowned champion of the annual Necromancer Tournament!

name: First Law
description: Escape the ice caves of Europa and return home in this retro inspired 2D sci-fi platformer. Journey through ice caves using Newtonian physics.

name: RnGesus Slayer
description: RnGesus Slayer is an exhilarating roguelike deckbuilder where your cards come from a slot-machine! Customize your slot-decks, twist fate to your advantage, and together with your wife, challenge RnGesus in your epic quest to become the ultimate Demon King.

name: Boundless Lust
description: Introducing "Boundless Lust" – the captivating visual novel game created by Farix. In "Boundless Lust," players make choices that shape the storyline, leading to different outcomes. Dive into a rich, story-driven experience.

name: Reclaim Earth
description: Reclaim Earth is a base-building, colony management, survival game where you play as a semi benevolent robot crash-landed on a post apocalyptic Earth. You must build your base, enlist the help of humans, and defend against hordes of mutated bugs.

name: NightSong
description: Tycho's Apocalypse. The game depicts a pilgrimage to Victory, the Capitol City of Lights.

name: Supernatural
description: Detective Wyatt confronts a chilling mystery as he investigates a housemaid's disappearance. Unearth sinister secrets as you navigate through a haunted house, where every shadow hides a lurking terror.

name: I Hate My Waifu Streamer
description: Draw the attention of the streamer at any cost, before someone else does it. Write comments, chat, make donations to your waifu, but do not dare to hate her!

name: Survive In Ankara
description: Welcome to Survive in Ankara! Are you ready to defeat the creatures that attack you, either with your friends or alone? I'm sure you can overcome these creatures with 5 customized characters. Join this adventure and destroy all creatures on 5 different maps

name: I Commissioned Some Butterflies 3
description: I paid artists to hide butterflies and flowers in 15 artworks. Can you find them all? Warning: Relaxing.

name: The Bell of Time
description: The Bell of Time is an adventure, puzzle and combat game where you'll play a teenager brought to a mysterious mansion. Explore this mansion with its horror-like visual and audio ambience, fight against the supernatural and solve puzzles using never-before-seen mechanics!

name: Sombionic
description: Shoot monsters and romance them during combat! In Sombionic you play as a female scientist fighting monsters and genetically engineered humans, harvesting their rare genes and organs for your own inventory.

name: Honeydew
description: Discover your destiny in Honeydew, an enchanting adult visual novel of self-discovery and romance, unraveling the secrets of a diverse and captivating world. With lush art, branching narrative, full narration, and a player-driven story, embark on an adventure where every choice defines your path.

name: The Crusade Is Nigh
description: The Crusade is Nigh Or TCIN is a game consisting of rpg, rts, and tower defense elements where you fight to control up to 5 lanes while trying to keep your base alive from enemy attacks using strategy & skill

name: Jumpers' Mountain
description: Join our little friends on this adventure, jumping between platforms to uncover the paths of 'Jumper's Mountain'. However, beware, as there are many secrets to reach the top, and a miscalculated jump can be quite costly.

name: Beer Runner
description: Jump, run, and climb over obstacles to deliver the keg of beer. Solve easy puzzles to progress further in the cyberpunk city. In each level, you'll discover new abilities like double jump, teleportation, etc. You can collect beer cans that will unlock additional content.

name: Past the Moon; Towards the Sun
description: Past the Moon; Towards the Sun is a fantasy visual novel that invites you into a richly woven tale of self-discovery and empowerment. Step into the shoes of Colleen, a young girl filled with apprehension about her future, whose dreams and aspirations seem out of reach.

name: The Die Is Cast
description: The Die is Cast. Now, all you need to do is trust your companions and penetrate the enemy's weaknesses.

name: Funky Rock Hoppers
description: Jump, dodge and flap yourself out of danger as a funky rockhopper. See what distance your penguin can reach while dodging various objects as well as sharks, birds and UFOs!

name: The End of You
description: The End of You is a short, emotional narrative game about love lost, the ghosts of the past, and the painful crawl towards closure.

name: Click On Lanterns Together
description: Can you and your friends find all 100+ lanterns in this panoramic level? Difficulty: Easy

name: Reflect
description: This is a simple and complex puzzle game about light. You need to use Optical components to direct lights and lit up the rings.

name: Sensei! I Like You So Much!
description: Sensei! I Like You So Much! is a fangirl simulator. Step into the shoes of a passionate fan girl and embark on a journey through the vibrant world of fan culture in this immersive simulation management game.

name: Click On Candy Together
description: Can you and your friends find all 100+ candies in this panoramic level?

name: Click On Red Pandas Together
description: Can you and your friends find all 100+ red pandas in this panoramic level?

name: Sentry System
description: Sentry System is a tower defense roguelike where you collect, modify and upgrade your sentries while progressing through a network of challenging encounters.

name: Roll 'n' Watch
description: Roll 'n' Watch is a simulated marble racing game where we bring the marble customization, beautiful tracks, customization, and the randomness of the beloved trending races you watch below those videos on social media.

name: Grasp of Dread
description: Grasp Of Dread is an asymmetrical multiplayer horror game where one player takes on the role of a monster from another world and tries to escape, while the other four players are monster hunters who seek to deal with the undead as soon as possible.

name: Quest of Peril
description: Dive into the dark world of a Dying Earth, in this Idle exploration rougelike with turn based combat

name: 9 Innings: Pro Baseball 2009
description:
It's time to play Baseball!

THE BEST REAL BASEBALL SIMULATION GAME ON THE APP STORE!!

name: Literally Every FNF Mod Ever
description:
Uh Oh, the man Bob is angry and you made them angry and they are so angry man, what did you do to make them angry? Honestly don’t know I’m just a game description.
Some parts of the Bob mod close the game unexpectedly and trigger a link to open that might trigger any anti-virus software to detect it as malware, please be aware that this is a fnf mod and not a trojan virus. If Bob asks for your personal information, please give it to them as it might be important.

for legal reasons this is a joke

name: 9 Innings: Pro Baseball Classic
description:
It's time to play Baseball! 9 Innings: Pro Baseball Classic
THE BEST REAL BASEBALL SIMULATION GAME ON THE APP STORE!!

Presenting the real quality baseball game, 9 Innings: Pro Baseball Classic, that all of baseball fans have been yearning for.

＊MLB Data not applied in the Classic version＊
Play ball in MLBPA’s fully-licensed real-time Major League baseball game in 《9 Innings: Pro Baseball 2011》.

name: 9 Innings: Pro Baseball 2011
description: REAL MLB players and teams in 9 Innings: Pro Baseball 2011!

name: Whimsical Wizardry
description:
Whimsical Wizardry is multiplayer party game about casting spells at your friends. Turn eight maps and four game modes into a chaotic battlefield as you scramble for victory! Who will be the best worst wizard of them all?

Cast 20 unique spells at your friends and enemies, each with their own wacky effects! Customize your wizard before heading into battle.

Whimsical Wizardry is developed by Silver Standard Studios, an independent game studio based out of Ottawa, Ontario.

name: 9 Innings: Pro Baseball 2012
description: 2011-2012 MLBPA Roster update.

name: Star Wars Battlefront: Companion
description: This strategic card-game connects with Star Wars Battlefront to earn in-game credits.

name: Cobra The Arcade
description:
"Cobra The Arcade" is a gun shooting game released by Namco (later Bandai Namco Games) in November 2005.

It is based on Buichi Terasawa's manga "Cobra" and the TV series "Space Cobra."

The gameplay is enhanced by a controller that resembles the Psycho Gun, and cards that allow data saving and strengthening the Psycho Gun.

It uses the system from Time Crisis 3, but a unique feature is the Psycho Shot, which locks on to enemies and takes down multiple enemies at once.

name: 9 Innings: Pro Baseball 2013
description:
Enjoy the real-life baseball experience with 9 Innings: 2013 Pro Baseball!
- Real-time schedule of the actual 2013 baseball league!

name: 9 Innings: Pro Baseball 2014
description:
Get ready for the No. 1 baseball game on mobile! It’s back and better than ever- 9 Innings: 2014 Pro Baseball!

Officially licensed with the Major League Baseball Players Association (MLBPA)!

9 Innings: 2014 Pro Baseball is the hottest, most realistic baseball simulation game that uses the names, photos, data, and league schedules of real baseball players!

name: 9 Innings: Pro Baseball 2015
description: 2015 Roster update to Com2us's 9 Innings Pro Baseball 14.

name: Horror Family: Flight
description: Horror Family - Flight is a time-loop horror game set on an airplane.

name: 9 Innings: Pro Baseball 2016
description:
Batter up for 9 Innings: 2016 Pro Baseball!
- New opening day roster for each team applied!
- 31 new players including Trevor Story and Joey Rickard.
- New Monster and Legend Grade Cards

This was the final version of 9 Innings before fully licensed MLB support version released.

name: Night Project
description: Night Project is the first game to introduce you to the history of corporate Degrees Intertainment. As you progress through the game, you will be able to find notes that will fully describe to you the entire deep history of the largest corporation in this game universe. The main antagonist is not a successful experiment of the Degrees Laboratories companies, called the "Kili project". Your task is not only to search for keys and notes, but also to simultaneously deceive the AI, whose task is to scare you as much as possible.

name: Pups & Purrs Animal Hospital and Fun! Fun! Animal Park
description: Pups & Purrs Animal Hospital and Fun! Fun! Animal Park Bundle

name: Red's Kingdom & Storm in a Teacup
description: Red’s Kingdom & Storm in a Teacup Bundle

name: Lake Minnewaska
description: Lake Minnewaska is a narrative driven first person fishing game. Fish, explore, and uncover the secrets of Lake Minnewaska as you guide Sosa's journey in becoming a better father.

name: Tower Defense: Last Castle
description: In the depths of an ancient forest, your castle the last human stronghold stands as the final bastion against a monstrous horde. Strategize your defense by employing soldiers, traps, towers, and even the monsters themselves.

name: Pixelitos: Spritle Royale
description: A creature-collecting teambuilding autobattler with over 130 unique elemental creatures to collect and battle with! Assemble a team of Pixelitos to face opponents in 6v6 auto battles. Face off in online asynchronous multiplayer, online versus with friends, or in the single-player campaign.

name: Hide and Seek
description: In Hide and Seek, players get to choose whether they want to be the one hiding or seeking.

name: Vribyss Refuge The Escape
description: While fleeing from the Kexxrans, Isla falls deep into a cave. As she searches for a way out, she encounters mysterious beings trapped there that may be able to help her get out. Discover the mysteries of Vribyss in this short-action role-playing story-driven game!

name: Starstream
description: Starstream is a 3D action-adventure shooter. In it, the brave Arlen must reclaim Castle Starstream, seized by the corrupt Lord Nova. Arlen battles through the Keep, Great Halls, and Startower to confront Lord Nova and free the Castle.

name: Ghosts
description: There is a war in hell too. Two factions of ghosts face each other. Pick your side and bring your army to glory!

name: Pelago
description: Pelago is a creature-catching adventure game! Explore the islands of Pelago and befriend the creatures that live there. Build your perfect team to overcome any challenge and unravel the mysteries of the islands.

name: Permanence Break
description: A sci-fi first-person puzzle game based around object permanence. Move and look around rooms in order to pick which objects you see and which you don't.

name: Grave Realms
description: Grave Realms is a fast and fun, arcade style twin-stick shooter with RPG elements. Powerups and elemental projectile attacks help carve your way through waves of unique enemies. Using the powerful Purge system, you decide your gameplay style! Can you survive the Grave Realms?

name: Malware
description: In order to induce users to install malware, unscrupulous software vendors try their best to hide malicious installation options in the installation programs of normal software. Can you avoid the numerous inducements set by software vendors and install pure software on your computer?

name: War of The Titans
description: Your people have been driven from their homeland by war. The elders speak of an ancient land where gods and men lived as one. After months at sea you land on a mysterious island that the elders believe is your ancient homeland. Rebuild your civilization, and uncover the secrets of your ancestors.

name: Ground to Dust
description: Navigate your way through a hostile underground facility in this two-dimensional side-scroller inspired by games like Hollow Knight and Metroid. Fight everything from a cleaning robot to a businessman trying to sell you goods while actively killing you. There are over 20 levels to explore in this non-linear platformer.

name: Poolrooms
description: Welcome to Level 37, commonly known as the Poolrooms, a psychological horror experience that immerses players in an eerie, otherworldly environment.

name: Runeflame
description: Runeflame is a point-and-click fantasy adventure with an open world and an emphasis on puzzle-solving. Guide your custom character through the immersive world of Runeflame, where secrets and magic have minds of their own.

name: Fluff's Adventure: A Tale of Fur and Steel
description: Fluff's Adventure: A Tale of Fur and Steel is a 3D third-person puzzle game with platforming elements. The game is focusing on non-textual storytelling, exploration and puzzles centered around fluffy furballs called "Fluffs". It creates a wholesome atmosphere in a stylized and colorful environment.

name: Sparky: Hills of Death
description: Hito Corporation immerses players in a dark universe where the monster, Sparky, comes to life in a sinister way, blurring the boundaries between reality and game. While cyber security expert Zac and his girlfriend Marina face strange events both in the game and in real life.

name: Gasping.2
description: GASPING.2 is a single player survival game, a dangerous and abandoned game world where only you and your companions exist. If you can tolerate loneliness, then explore it, which requires patience.

name: Elf Defense
description: Players can place characters, sell characters, set up automatic skill release, skill synthesis and more by clicking the mouse. The game provides an intuitive and easy to understand interface and operations, so that players can easily play the game.

name: Purge Party
description: See what's coming ahead and select your targets with the FEARBOARD battle system, a fresh take on turn-based combat. Explore a nightmarish world full of secrets, and make unlikely friends and enemies along the way.

name: Rheinland
description: Let yourself be carried away by Wanderslust and travel down the medieval River Rhine with the musicians. Experience a cozy, narrative-heavy fantasy story. Gather harmony and manage your resources. The key to everything is music, so improvise your own songs since in Rheinland everyone is a musician!

name: Cyber Assasin
description: Cyber Assassin is a fast-paced arena shooter where you control a robot annihilating waves of enemies. Survive, upgrade your character after each wave, and become more powerful to dominate the arena!

name: Rap Pop Jump Core
description: Rap Pop Jump Core is a hardcore action platformer demanding constant movement, quick decisions, and combat. Navigate a vibrant city by leaping between platforms. One mistake, and you fall to your fate. Escape swiftly!

name: SkyLeague
description: Enjoy and master your sky car. Participate in soccer matches, races and other mini-games. Explore the world to meet other players and cooperate with them during matches. Grind ranked ladders to become the greatest champion of Sky League.

name: Dungeon Digger
description: Dungeon Digger is a roguelike game about a brave dwarf seeking legendary treasures. Descend deep underground, mine valuable minerals, craft upgraded gear, and battle spiders, golems, worms, and ghosts to become a cave hero!

name: Titleless Tale
description: An auto-battle RPG. Gather randomly generated rare equipment and companions to train your party and take on formidable foes.

name: Station Zeta
description: Run, jump, shoot, and think your way to safety in this retro-inspired 2D puzzle-platformer. Station Zeta is out of control, and you'll have to deal with crazed robots, terribly designed station machinery, and blatant safety hazards as you try to make your escape across 35 levels.

name: 5 Minute Raid
description: A boss raid where the boss is also a player!A team of 3 guardians. 6 classes 12 perksAn abomination from the 3rd dimension, ready to singlehandedly destroy the worldOnly 5 minutes until the destruction of the 2nd dimension!A casual quirky 1 vs 3 asymmetrical PvP experience: 5 Minute Raid!

name: AI Solitaire: Handsome Heroes
description: AI Solitaire - Handsome Heroes provides 12 new decks to use with AI Solitaire! This DLC is themed around handsome men in a variety of artistic styles ranging from phtorealistic to comic book styles.

name: AI Solitaire: Lovely Ladies
description: AI Solitaire - Lovely Ladies provides 12 new decks to use with AI Solitaire! This DLC is themed around beautiful girls in a photorealistic style.

name: Northern Song Dynasty
description: A real-time strategy game based on the history of the Northern Song Dynasty. The player can experience the fun of conquering cities, directing the country, and ultimately uniting the world through their own efforts in the simulated historical background of the game!

name: Zlin City: Arch Moderna
description: Zlín City: Arch Moderna is a unique, visually stunning, and relaxing city-building game set in the 1930s and 1940s, inspired by actual historical events and the functionalist architecture of Zlín.

name: Z-Ape: Tower Defense
description: Z-Ape is a unique tower defense and first person shooter mash up game. Hordes of enemies attacking your base, it's up to you to stop them by placing towers or fighting them on FPS mode with guns, or both!

name: Witching Well
description: Welcome to 'Witching Well,' a magical world where creativity thrives. Master unusual and powerful magic and use it to shape the world around you. Build, decorate and create vibrant villages filled with unique characters. Grant wishes, make friends, and have fun. Your journey begins!

name: Within: Hannah's Journey
description: In this turn-based JRPG, discover Hannah's strange journey into the confines of her nightmares and memories. Taking part in a mysterious place where all her regrets, mourning and mistakes reside.

name: Wizard Tournament
description: In this party combat game, up to 4 players battle it out. Assert your supremacy as the last survivor and claim victory! Traps, alliances, betrayals - anything goes to survive in the arena.

name: Wizlite: Everybody loved RPGs
description: “Wizlite” is an RPG that merges the old-school command battle system with the popular roguelite genre. It offers gripping moments during battles and while unlocking treasure chests, as well as strategic decisions about whether to advance or rest based on remaining health and spell count.

name: Wizwag
description: Explore a charming, mysterious world in a classic, top-down action adventure! Investigate monster-infested dungeons, collect items to unlock new moves, and solve puzzles to uncover the truth, with help from some unusual friends.

name: Phoots and the Pineapple Throne
description: Take action as a demon from another world takes over your home island. Play as Ridge, a Phoot who lost his memories and must save the island from being destroyed. Travel across hand drawn environments, unlock weapons and spells, and defeat challenging bosses.

name: Wonder Wand
description: Embark on a spellbinding adventure in a strange land that’s brimming with puzzling dungeons, bouncing slimes & zany encounters in WONDER WAND, a 2D puzzle game about a confused fox with a magical wand.

name: Woohoo!
description: Woohoo! is a compilation of casual puzzle and arcade games.

name: Woohoo!: Game - Pool Frenzy
description: Pool Frenzy is a game where you shoot the white ball to hit the other balls into the pockets in the lowest amount of time. You also must not let the white ball fall into a pocket. There's 3 pool tables, 3 ball orientations and 2 ball group counts to choose from.

name: Woohoo!: Game - Skee Madness
description: Skee Madness is a game where you roll the ball with force down a table and then the ball flies through the air towards a group of holes. You earn points depending on which hole the ball goes through. There are 3 game modes.

name: Woohoo!: Game - Triangles
description: Triangles is a game where you lay triangular shaped tiles next to each other on a grid. The numbers in the three corners of a tile must match the numbers of the touching tiles in that affiliated corner.

name: Woohoo!: Game - WordSearch
description: WordSearch is the classic game of finding words in a grid of characters. Every level is random. Every level uses a random subject and picks random words for that subject. The placement of the words are random too. You won't play the same level twice. Use your mouse to select the words in the grid.

name: Word On The Hook
description: An exciting intellectual fishing game, where as a “fish” you need to catch words and earn coins!

name: Work Beasts
description: Manage your workforce of mystical work beasts! Increase your team productivity in order to complete the most difficult jobs and earn lots of money, after all, the government won't leave you alone if you don't pay your taxes. Oh, don't forget to give your employers a coffee sometimes.

name: World Heritage VR: Swedish Farmhouse
description: Virtual World Heritage: Fågelsjö is a VR rendition of the Fågelsjö farmsteads from the 1700s, located in the Hälsningland area of Sweden.

name: Xián Shàng Huíyīn
description: Xián Shàng Huíyīn is a Chinese browser spin-off game for the game Genshin Impact. The game is a rhythm game and was made to celebrate the birthday of the character Venti in 2020. It is only playable on mobile devices.

name: Narcis Crosswords
description: Narcis Crosswords is a crossword game that is bundled in with the Persian software Narcis Dictionary. The game is made to help English learners understand the language better using crossword puzzles.

name: Heaven Over It
description: The theme is to go up, and your mission is to get to heaven. It's a vertical scroll platformer, indie and single player action game. It is controlled using only the mouse and can be completed in a few minutes.

name: Ace Attorney: Ultimate Justice
description: Ultimate Justice is a fan-made crossover between the murder mysteries franchise of Ace Attorney and Danganronpa. It will follow the lawyers of the Wright Anything Agency as they defend students of Hope’s Peak in various murder cases.

name: Terezi Pyrope: Ace Attorney
description: Tavros is accused of Murder by an old FLARPing buddy in a Court-Only Tutorial case.

name: Ruby's Vitten Party
description:
A horror video-game featuring VTuber RubyWhiska's Birthday Party.

What begins as a seemingly pleasant visit to her house quickly descends into chaos, as guests must fight to survive the night or face being transformed into Vittens.

name: Odens öga
description:
Odens Öga is a third-person action game with twelve levels. Players must find and collect keys to unlock gates to the next level. The worlds are populated with monsters, including aggressive wolves and rabbits. Players use ranged missile attacks and limited flight abilities to combat these creatures.

There are seven characters to choose from, differing only in appearance. Points are earned by defeating enemies and collecting amulets. Other collectibles, like stones and chests, boost health or reduce monster damage. Stepping on anthills affects player abilities, either positively or negatively. Players have three lives per level and must restart the level if all lives are lost.

name: Honkai Impact 3rd: Crusade of Chasing Shadows
description:
Version 7.5 of Honkai Impact 3rd, which includes:
• New Part 2 Story Chapter 3: A Crime Foretold
• New S Rank Valkyrie: Lone Destruction: Shadowchaser (Lantern)
• New Featured Event: Lantern Against Shadows
• New Event: Non-Stop Stage Clears Carnival
• ...and more!

name: Swingmania
description: Swingmania is a Virtual Reality rhythm game where you slice the notes!

name: Totally Spies! 4: Around the World
description: Sin descripción

name: Brick Block
description: A 3D tile editor, in your browser.

name: Tamagotchi Nano Colorful Detective Conan
description:
A licensed Tamagotchi Nano model based on the popular manga Detective Conan.
This model of Nano is the first one to have colors and rechargable batteries.

name: Paper Mario Randomizer
description: A randomizer for Paper Mario on the Nintendo 64. Generate your own seed and discover the game in a fresh new way!

name: Call of Duty: Modern Warfare III - Season 4
description:
A disturbing discovery can change everything. A mysterious DNA bomb has been found at Popov Power in Urzikstan, and it’s up to you and your squadmates to unlock the mystery behind this potentially devastating weapon and prevent catastrophe. While you obtain various DNA samples during the ominous Critical Countdown Event, you can also further explore the multitude of bunkers across Urzikstan, potentially unearthing new ways to exit.

The potential outbreak seeps into Multiplayer, with a worldwide assortment of core 6v6 maps, plenty of exhilarating modes, revered weapons, new perks, destructive killstreaks, and battle-ready recon and hazmat inspired gear throughout the Battle Pass, so you can stay protected while remaining deadly calm and effective. One slip-up could alter everything, so suit up, drop in, uncover the truth, and stop the threat!

name: The Bathhouse Restored Edition
description: The Bathhouse | 地獄銭湯 Remake is a Japanese horror game that revolves around working at a bathhouse. A complete revamp of the original bathhouse.

name: Necronator
description:
Necronator is a zombie-based strategy game, developed by TogeProductions.
Players summon and control the undead forces, conquering the world by killing any human who stands in the way.

name: Necronator 2
description: This is the sequel of the hit RTS game, Necronator. Complete 6 different campaigns from 6 different races. Fight on forests, mountains, and wastelands. Upgrade your army, learn new spells, unlock special heroes and much more in this epic fantasy strategy game by Toge Productions.

name: Touhou Danmaku Maze
description: Developed by Ice Fall Creative, Touhou meets Maze Play in this Hand-Drawn Comedy Arcade game featuring the strongest fairy in Gensoukyou!

name: MLB 9 Innings
description:
​Enjoy a Major League Baseball game in the palm of your hands! Mike Trout's favorite baseball game, MLB 9 Innings - an officially licensed MLB Mobile Game!

- Enjoy realistic MLB experience featuring approximately 2,000 MLB star players and 600 types of hitting & pitching forms, all perfectly implemented in full 3D graphics.
- Collect your favorite players, upgrade them, and make the greatest team.
- Explore endless amount of content including real-time battles, league mode, and more!

name: Le Sceptre d'Anubis
description: Le Sceptre d'Anubis is a French text-based adventure game with graphics set in the Pyramid of Djoser. The player takes a role of an experienced archeologist on vacation in Egypt, who occasionally discovered an ancient papyrus in one of the souks or Cairo. Deciphering its hardly readable hieroglyphs, he realized that the secret entrance within this pyramid leads to the tomb of Amenhotep II, holding the gift of the gods: The Scepter of Anubis. Trying to find it, the archeologist was going on an expedition equipped with a high-tech hieroglyph decryptor, a flashlight, and a gun, but forgetting to take a water. So, typing in the commands in form of "verb + noun", the player should help the archeologist to find the Scepter of Anubis avoiding the numerous traps and hostile pyramid's inhabitants.

name: Turnabout Train Or Shine
description: The familiar case is presented in a new, more rational and grounded, but also more wholesome and satisfying way. Using the simplistic but enjoyable Ace Attorney mechanics, approaching the same case from different angles, this will be an enjoyable experience for those that know the case very well and cannot get over it.

name: Doggy
description: White Doggy is running on the linear forest road to reach his kennel. The screen scrolls from left to right to simulate this event seen from a third-person perspective. The road is full of different obstacles, and it is the player's task to avoid them. The obstacles vary from traps, barriers, logs, pits, etc. to a truck scattering the debris or a wolf running in the opposite direction. Doggy may be controlled to jump and move on the road up and down. The dog's energy is gradually exhausting while it is running. Bones scattered on the road may be collected to refill the dog's energy. If the energy is vanished or with each obstacle struck, the dog loses a life. There are five dog lives at the start. The best scores are stored in a high score table.

name: Carnaval
description: Game by Eric Chahi

name: Le Pacte
description: e Pacte is an horror style adventure game published by the French Company Loriciels in 1986. The story revolves around the player being part of a team sent to investigate the house of Amityville, with two other parapsychologists called Evrett Wilson and Laura Relfod (plus their dog, Black). The game does not use a textual interface, like most of the adventure games of its time; instead the player has to associate two words within a very long list.

name: New Hope
description:
New Hope is an LGBTQI+ inclusive story starring Justin, an 18-year-old high school senior with two very big secrets. He's gay and trying to hold onto his secrets until finally finishing senior year and moving off to college. But when he loses his songbook, things take an unexpected turn as Justin begins to message a mystery guy who shares the same secret.

Being gay isn't the only thing Justin's trying to hide, however.

name: Wingless Fairies
description:
Wingless Fairies is a first-person stage play about becoming someone new again.

YOU ARE: Fawn-Mar Evangeline, a Great Fairy in training. It's your first day shadowing at your friend Velvet's gay bar / dressing room hybrid. Your role is simple on paper, but being a mentor to all who walk through the door will take more vulnerability than you know. Enter Rain.

name: Star Defender 4
description: Star Defender 4 is a simulation-arcade game developed by VADZIM KAMKOU and Awem Studio. It was originally released in 2008. It was published by Awem Studio.

name: Look_in_Dark
description: This game was created within the Touhou Game Jam held on Touhou Station in August 2021 and is a derivative work of Touhou Project.

name: MLB 9 Innings 17
description:
Batter up for MLB 9 Innings 17!
- Roster update to the 2016-17 MLB Season!

name: MLB 9 Innings 19
description:
4.0.0
- Club Battle Improvement & Official Opening
- New Pick'em Content
- 2019 season schedule implemented
- Special Training Lv. 6 effect changed
- New Player Book Board
- Each team's Ballpark Improvements

name: Flip-Flip
description:
Flip-Flip was created at Touhou Game Jam.
This game is a Touhou Project fan game.

name: Flip-Flip plus
description:
Flip-Flip plus was created at Touhou Game Jam.
This game is a Touhou Project fangame.

If Flip-Flip was not enough for you or you have the skill, give it a try!

name: Day of the Hamster
description:
Day of the Hamster is a point & click graphic adventure game in the style of Day of the Tentacle. It's a short and sweet experience about escaping from a locked vault.
It's a sidequel to Day of the Sandwich.

name: Otaku Simulator
description:
Otaku Simulator is a simulation game who the goal is to protect player's reputation
You can kill all of yours enemies who want to destroy your reputation.

name: MLB 9 Innings 20
description:
5.0.2
- MLB 9 Innings 2020 season has been updated!
- A new roster has been applied for the 2020 season.
- Cody Bellinger has joined us as a new highlight model. Check out the new game icon and title screen!
- New Club Mission & Club Crafting! Craft new items to improve your team!
- TEX's new stadium added.
- The new 2020 uniforms of each team have been applied.

name: Making Fiends: Pumpin Plunkin'
description:
Pumpkin Plunkin' is a Flash game made by Amy Winfrey for the Making Fiends website. It is also available at Nicktoons' site.

At the beginning of the game, the rules are explained by both Charlotte and Vendetta. The overall objective is to throw pumpkins at Charlotte while she moves around the screen in various costumes.

name: Virtual Gym Fighting
description: Step into 'Gym Heroes: Fighting Game,' where the worlds of boxing, karate, kung fu, and wrestling collide in dynamic one-on-one battles. Begin your journey as a novice, learning the ropes of boxing and karate. Then, advance to master the intense moves of kung fu and wrestling. As you conquer each fight, your skills in these fighting games will grow, making you a formidable force in the gym arena.

name: Robot Street Fighting Games
description: Ready yourself for rescue of girl from robot games vs machine games. Robot fighting tournament starting in new grand robot fighting games.

name: Shoka
description: The most grueling and unfair Isekai turn based RPG made with a budget of literally $0 (got RPG Maker VXA from a steam key giveaway), most will fail over and over and over until they eventually gives up and quit. Will you accept the challenge or chicken out? The choice is yours to be made. I pride myself on my ability to create a game with consistent power scaling and no plot holes.

name: Splatter World
description: A cancelled RPG based on the Splatterhouse franchise.

name: Cosmo Mambo No. 5
description: Space Mambo Shooter.

name: Metal Dragon
description: METAL DRAGON is a 5 map episode for doom2.wad using primarily metallic and industrial textures sourced from otex with some relatively difficult, but not extremely intense gameplay.

name: Puzzles and Pieces
description: Puzzles and Pieces is very small set of monsterless vanilla puzzle maps made by Christophine Place, and makes use of Patchtex (by Gothic) and plenty of mapping tricks and exploits. Each map is set in a small comfy environment to walk around and solve little brain teasers in.

name: Spectrum Descent
description: Spectrum Descent is an MBF21-compatible project with a colorful, gothic aesthetic by The Afternoon Crew, led by Ludi.The wad features a fully bespoke soundtrack, lots of custom textures, and a wide variety of gameplay styles.

name: Eureka fountains
description:
A map made by RataUnderground to test the Eureka editor.
Lost in another place, in another time... The fountains of Eureka were a citadel that could only be accessed through portals.

name: Sonic Robo Blast 2: The Chaotix
description:
The Chaotix Are Here!

Six unique characters, six unique playstyles! Play as Espio, Mighty, Charmy, Vector, Heavy, and Bomb in SRB2!

name: The Front Yard
description:
"Meat embraces you whole."

Chicago, 1883.

At the epicenter of bloody beef and pig innards live Fergal Byrne and Eoin Kairys, two New Yorkers who've moved to The Yards for work. Their days are drawn out, miserable, and smelly as they survive work just to sleep another night.

The Front Yard is a short, visual-novel-style RPG Maker game following the monotonous and mundane lives of two best friends who've been consumed by the guilt of living and meat they work with.

name: Perfect Love
description: A horror-romance visual novel where you shape Milo Change, a student in one of the classes that you attend, into your desired, Perfect Love.

name: Yass or Pass
description: "You're a totally voluntary and in no way kidnapped contestant on the hottest speed dating game show in this reality!"

name: One-sided Loneliness
description: 'One-sided loneliness' is a short clicker game, where you take care of a cute alien goat boy. Made for Summer Slow Jams 2023: Idle, using creative theme 'Mutation'.

name: Late Night Hunger
description: Enter a quiet town where Alex, a 9-year-old boy, lives a normal life. But when the clock strikes midnight, his house turns into a place of mystery and fear. Dark hallways, hidden rooms, and strange shadows transform his familiar home into a creepy adventure.

name: The Ocean View From the Keiyo Line
description: A short-form interactive fiction game with two endings. A trans woman riding the Keiyo line looks out toward the ocean.

name: Super Mario Galaxy 2 3: Impossible Hak 2
description: 'Super Mario Galaxy 2 3: Impossible Hak 2' is a ROM hack for Super Mario 64, submitted to SimpleFlips' 2023 Troll Hack Competition. It earned second place, below TROLLLAB.

name: Batman
description: A remake that was in the works for a long time and was on-hold a few times. One of the best games for ZX Spectrum ever created, surpassed only by its successor Head Over Heels, which was also remade by our team. Help BatMan find seven pieces of the BatCraft scattered around the caves, mansion and other places. In the end find the BatCraft and finish this adventure.

name: Mobile Quest GB
description:
In an alternate universe where the Mobile Adapter GB made it outside japan, one company released a "massively multiplayer" online game that could be played without raking up phone bills, allowing it to garnering a strong player base...

Until today when it was announced the servers would be going down. Out of the blue you get an email from a friend you partied with numerous times before, telling you to log in today for one final quest before the game dies.

name: Prodigal
description:
After two years abroad, the prodigal childe of Tremere Elder Benedict finally returns.... but all is not well. Was this familiar mansion always so rotten? Was your daytime sleep always this troubled? Did these usual smiles always hide something? And why can't you remember anything about this 'trip' you're supposed to have gone on?

The truth waits beyond your nightmares.

Welcome home, Kolya.

This game was created as a part of the Dark Pack Vampire: The Masquerade game jam and released under the World of Darkness Unbound license. Events portrayed in this game are not canon within the World of Darkness.

This is just a funny little story to frighten fledglings.

name: Maskerade: The Deadpan Cry
description: Maskerade is a first person narrative oriented Survival Horror game, where you incarnate a young girl who has been kidnapped and forced to work as a ballerina in a terrific and mysterious cabaret, from which she must find a way to escape from the clutches of the Madame who runs it.

name: Backrooms: Between Lost Dimension
description: Backrooms: Between Lost Dimensions is a horror game that immerses you in the surreal world of the Backrooms. Trapped in an endless maze of monotonous rooms, you must solve disturbing puzzles and face sinister creatures to find an escape. Is your escape just an illusion?

name: Coach Fight
description: Pick your coach and fight increasingly challenging opponents!

name: It's Our Revolution
description:
It's Our Revolution! is a freeware "puzzle RPG" by Wood Penguin made in RPG Maker VX Ace.

The goal of the game is for the unheard youth to gather a following to sway the king. Unfortunately, as your ensemble grows, you'll find it becomes a little difficult to get around...

name: Edward's Sewer Adventure
description:
"I'm going to tell you the story, the story of how I got lost in the sewers..."

In Edward's Sewer Adventure

You explore the depths of the sewers found on Pine Island. Located beneath the city, hidden from plain sight, many things can take place in the dark. Strange noises have been recorded. Are you brave enough to venture into the dark and damp smelly sewers? Or are you chicken...
You will meet friends unlooked for and evil forces on your journey.
You will experience revolutionary 3D-Graphics. A true stable of cutting edge PSX technology.

name: Touhou: Wandering Souls
description: Wandering Souls is a 2013 action role playing game developed by Estheone using RPG Maker VX. The player takes the role of three characters; Reimu, Marisa and Sakuya as they try to collect all wandering souls and travel to Edge of Heaven to find out who is responsible for the incident of Kekkai (barriers). The player starts with Reimu while Marisa and Sakuya will join later. Only one can fight while others act as supporting characters. Each character has a different special move, weapon and accessories; but have the same basic moves such as double jump, air dash and hyper mode. There are four barriers and each require different conditions to be unlocked. Sometimes enemies drop money and the player can use it to purchase items, weapons or accessories at Rinnosuke's shop. Wandering Souls also features hidden paths, an extra final boss and new game modes with higher difficulties which can be unlocked upon game completion.

name: Low Frequency
description:
After a catastrophe you are left adrift on your old ship hoping to find life.

Although not human...

name: Road To Siren Hills: Dark Journey
description:
Your car has died in the middle of nowhere.
The only thing you see is darkness and a flashlight lying on the grass.
Your only option is to go on foot, but where will the journey lead you to?

name: Altcode
description: Hordes of robotic ships from another world threaten the earth. As the newly self-aware hive mind of every CRT monitor display humans threw away to replace with fancy flat screen plasma tvs, you have to prove your worth and defend those who originally created you. Maybe they will want you back?!!

name: Redfir Hills
description: Time is running out: Outsmart the killer and save Zoe before it's too late! Investigate a realistic criminal case that only YOU can solve!

name: Glint Glitters
description:
Glint Glitters features a group of young kids experts in robotics that build robots. One day when the main character is building a small robot his rival in the classroom appear with a bigger robot and tell him that he's going to participate in the robots competition. So he decided to build a bigger version of his robot and take part on the competition too.

The competition is a board game in which the winner is the first one in arrive to the goal (get 20000 of gold). During the board there will be events, traps, shops (Where the player can buy items for his character or the robot) and other situations that can help or act against the players.

The game features 2D cartoon graphics, japanese voices and anime sequences.

name: Legacy of Kalevala
description: Legacy of Kalevala is a re-engineered, re-envisioned and re-maked version of the original Legend of Kalevala flash game!

name: Purrfect Apawcalypse! Incredible Furture!
description: This is the PA series first Fan-game!

name: Purrfect Apawcalypse: Infamous Furiend?!
description: This is the PA series third Fan-game!

name: Purrfect Apawcalypse: Ideal Finale!!!
description: This is the PA series fourth Fan-game!

name: Tiny Hawk: Pico Sk8r
description: An isometric bird-based demake of the Tony Hawk's Pro Skater series.

name: Danger Street
description:
Danger Street is an arcade game set in New York 2017, a superb city filled with most infamous criminals in the entire galaxy. The highest council of New York has decided to finish it once and for all and massively eliminate these scums. The player is the vigilante of the future, who must rid the city of all these decadent beings. New York is counting on you!

So, the player should shoot the enemies appearing on the screen and shooting at you with an aiming crosshair while scrolling the street from left to right. Once all the enemies are eliminated on the level, the player is transferred to the next level gaining the scores and the bonus. There is no health bar, and it is only one life for the player.

name: Profanation
description: Profanation is an action game, where the player controls a fearless adventurer on his way to the mystical doors leading to hell. Entering a devilish castle with his only friend, a superb rifle, the adventurer should find a door on the level, collecting the treasures and eliminating their guardians such as bats, blobs of slime, zombies, insects and giant flies. The found door transfers the adventurer to the next level. When the adventurer is collided with an enemy, he is transferred to the most recent stored position on the level without one of his lives. Losing all the lives leads to the end of the game.

name: Perfect Apocalypse: The Day After
description: Sin descripción

name: Brain Test: Mental Games
description: Brain Test is an addictive tricky puzzle game with a series of tricky brain teasers. Different riddles and tricky tests will challenge your mind. This new puzzle game may break common sense and bring you a new brain-pushing experience!

name: Alchemist
description: "Alchemist" is a free-to-play game available on your browser. You can level up your character and become stronger. You can team up with friends to participate in tournaments, buy and sell items to earn money, create your own nation, raise pets, forge the ultimate weapon, or simply enjoy chatting. In the world of "Alchemist," where adventurers gather, you can become whoever you want to be and find your own unique way to enjoy the adventure.

name: Riviera: The Promised Land
description:
The first entry in the Department Heaven Episodes, Riviera: The Promised Land, comes back as a remastered release. Various additional features have been implemented, significantly upgrading playability. From newcomers to returning players, it is packed with satisfying elements.

Remastered Features

Change the background music between five different sound sources.
Play at up to 5x speed.
Skip event scenes.
All illustrations are in high-definition resolution.
Auto-save.
Difficulty level and mode select options increase playability.
Boost feature enables quick skill learning.
A more user-friendly interface.
Touchscreen support.
Freely switch between Japanese and English voice-overs.
Note: Text is Japanese-only.
And more!

name: Rockman 3: Burst Chaser
description:
"Rockman 3: Burst Chaser is a level & gameplay hack.

Aside from level edited stages, Burst Chaser’s main feature is that Rockman moves faster!

The hack also has modified enemies & Robot Master AI’s. Also, the hack offers ‘new’ music cut from other games as well as from popular animes."

name: Super Metroid: Y-Faster
description:
"Entry for MetConst Summer Contest ""Race to the Finish""

Plot : A flying brain from another dimension is wrecking the galaxy, Samus has decided to put an end to this.
She has less than one hour to complete her task otherwise she'll die from heavy brain damage.

Goal : Defeat 4 main bosses in 4 distinct areas then head to the final area as fast as possible.
Each area can be completed in one run and in any order (no need to go back and forth between areas to progress).
There's a bit of exploration thrown in for good measure but for the most part, the main path is quite straightforward (I think?)
In case you're confused, look at the map - all area maps are available from the start.
Backtracking is usually needed when you're exiting an area to go the next one.
Most enemies has altered vulnerabilities, health and damage so you should be able to deal with them underequipped.
That includes bosses & zebetites weak to uncharged shots, etc.
Yet, as a general rule of thumb, bumping into everything (ie enemies, spikes) isn't the best way to progress."

name: Grit & Valor: 1949
description: Command an elite squad of Mechs in this alternate World War 2 dieselpunk real-time tactics roguelite. Think fast, battle the Evil Axis forces, and neutralise their HQ. Upgrade your Mechs and Pilots, and develop new strategies to defeat the enemy!

name: Flutter!
description: A level hack for Yoshi's Island containing 30 new stages.

name: Ooooo
description: A 82 exit level hack for Super Mario World by JUMP Team and Kevin centered around green bean-based gimmicks and challenges.

name: Erina to Kima no Miyako
description: Erina, an engineer and a self-proclaimed adventurer, finds herself in Era Sheila after wandering from place to place fulfilling requests in pursuance of the romantic adventuring dream. The city is named after a famous adventurer, who happens to be one of Erina's aspirations as an adventurer herself. Little did she know, the city had another moniker, widely known as the City of Machines. Just what does this city, one full of sex-starved men, have in store for Erina?

name: Confined
description: Confined is a short horror-puzzle game where you have three minutes to solve a puzzle to escape a kidnapper’s grungy, dangerous basement.

name: Future Fighter
description:
A small and simple space shooter for the unexpanded VIC-20.

Shoot enemies and get points. If the enemy reaches the bottom of the screen, you lose points.

if you lose all your points, you die.

name: Formula V20: 1985
description:
Formula V20 '85 is a racing computer game for the 24k expanded Commodore Vic-20. It has been crafted in the style of the classic Commodore 64 games Pitstop II and Pole position.

Pick from seven different racing teams and four different circuits. Join a single race or compete in the world championship.

name: Yep It's More Skiing
description: You won a beauty competition and thereby the accompanying grand prize of a skiing holiday at an exclusive ski resort - YIPEE! After two days of skiing and sitting in front of a cozy fireplace with hot chocolate in the evenings, you develop an aggravated case of boredom. So the following day you start looking for a challenge and lo and behold you have now found one: The ski slope called 'The Devil's Run'. This slope has been closed for a long time due to excessive injuries and accidents. You obviously ignore all warnings and have decided to attempt the run. Can you guess how this will end?

name: Midnight Crimes
description: It is 1933 and prohibition is about to end. Organized crime syndicates are flooding the black market with their product and it is making them exorbitant profits one last time. At the very same moment Eliot Ness and his Untouchables find themselves in a battle of survival in the city. You are one of these untouchables and you have to get to the criminals before they get to you. So strap on both your holsters because you're shooting it out every night.

name: Galaxian Sleena
description: Galaxian Sleena is a fast paced Shoot 'em up for the whole family! Prepare to have a swollen trigger finger as you shoot down aliens and battle four Sleena Overlords while traversing the alien megastructure. You only have a single ship to combat the enemy but luckily it has been armed with a powerful laser cannon that makes quick work of the Sleena's minions. Can you beat the Galaxian Sleena?

name: Sly Cooper and the Thievius Raccoonus
description: Master the art of theiving, outsmart foes, and reclaim the family legacy! Experience Sly Cooper and the Thievius Raccoonus originally released on the PlayStation 2 console, enhanced with up-rendering, rewind, quick save and custom video filters.

name: Rota: Kurofune
description: A Portuguese merchant who goes by Vasco looking for wealth in foreign lands tries to start business with Japan, he must fight pirates and earn the trust of the Japanese for his business to grow and prosper. However, the Japanese have reason to believe that the merchant is also trading with the Chinese, Vasco must try his best to hide this fact to not cause conflict. He isnt the only portuguese merchant in Japan, as other merchants may try to stop Vasco, going as far as sending assassins after him. Can Vasco surive this struggles while staying in the good side of the Japanese?

name: Dream Hopper
description: An adventure platformer made in 5 days for the 2014 Nitrome game jam. Explore the lucid dream world of Jayson, and escape from his twisted mind.

name: Below, Rusted Gods
description: A short horror game where you control an operator helping an expedition through a hole descending into the unknown.
